How lush and lusty the grass looks! how green!

ANTONIO:
What impossible matter will he make easy next?

SEBASTIAN:
You were kneel'd to and importuned otherwise
By all of us, and the fair soul herself
Weigh'd between loathness and obedience, at
Which end o' the beam should bow. We have lost your
son,
I fear, for ever: Milan and Naples have
More widows in them of this business' making
Than we bring men to comfort them:
The fault's your own.

AUFIDIUS:
Say no more:
Here come the lords of Buckingham and Derby.

BUCKINGHAM:
Even that, I hope, which pleaseth God above,
And all good men of this ungovern'd isle.

GLOUCESTER:
My other self, my counsel's consistory,
My oracle, my prophet! My dear cousin,
I, like a child, will go by thy direction.
Towards Ludlow then, for we'll not stay behind.

First Citizen:
If I must not, I need not be barren of accusations;
he hath faults, with surplus, to tire in repetition.
What shouts are these? The other side o' the city
is risen: why stay we prating here? to the Capitol!

All:
Long live Edward the Fourth!

KING EDWARD IV:
What service wilt thou do me, if I give them?

LADY CAPULET:
Accursed, unhappy, wretched, hateful day!
Most miserable hour that e'er time saw
In lasting labour of his pilgrimage!
But one, poor one, one poor and loving child,
But one thing to rejoice and solace in,
And cruel death hath catch'd it from my sight!

Nurse:
I'll lay fourteen of my teeth,--
And yet, to my teeth be it spoken, I have but four--
She is not fourteen. How long is it now
To Lammas-tide?

LADY CAPULET:
He shall be thrown down the Tarpeian rock,
That the precipitation might down stretch
Below the beam of sight, yet will I still
Be thus to them.

A Patrician:
This man has marr'd his fortune.

MENENIUS:
There is differency between a grub and a butterfly;
yet your butterfly was a grub. This Marcius is grown
from man to dragon: he has wings; he's more than a
creeping thing.

SICINIUS:
Fie, fie!
Thy sin's not accidental, but a trade.
Mercy to thee would prove itself a bawd:
an unshunned consequence; it must be so. Art going
to prison, Pompey?

POMPEY:
Very well:
Could he say less?

COMINIUS:
Assemble presently the people hither;
And when they from thy bosom pluck a flower,
Guard it, I pray thee, nurse, say I.

Nurse:
if you be he, sir, I desire some confidence with
you.

SICINIUS:
But how prevail'd you?

BIANCA:
Why, gentlemen, you do me double wrong,
To strive for that which resteth in my choice:
I am no breeching scholar in the schools;
I'll not remember you of my own lord,
Who is lost too: take your patience to you,
And I'll renew me in his fall. But, hark!

FERDINAND:
Yes, faith, and all his lords; the Duke of Milan
And his brave son being twain.

CLAUDIO:
Sweet sister, let me live:
What sin you do to save a brother's life,
Nature dispenses with the deed so far
That it becomes a virtue.

ISABELLA:
Yes, he would give't thee, from this rank offence,
So to offend him still. This night's the time
That I should do what I abhor to name,
Or else thou art suborn'd against his honour
In hateful practise. First, his integrity
Stands without blemish. Next, it imports no reason
That with such vehemency he should pursue
Faults proper to himself: if he had so offended,
He would have weigh'd thy brother by himself
And not have cut him off. Some one hath set you on:
Confess the truth, and say by whose advice
Thou camest--

GLOUCESTER:
Be patient, for the world is broad and wide.

ROMEO:
Is it even so? rewards he my true service
With such deep contempt made I him king for this?
O, let me pray before I take my death!
To thee I do commend my watchful soul,
Ere I let fall the windows of mine eyes:
Sleeping and waking, O, defend me still!

Ghost of Prince Edward:

Ghost of GREY:

Ghost of BUCKINGHAM:
Have done, have done.

QUEEN ELIZABETH:
If he were putting to my house the brand
That should consume it, I have not the face
To say 'Beseech you, cease.' You have made fair hands,
You and your crafts! you have crafted fair!

COMINIUS:
O, let me make the period to my curse!

GLOUCESTER:
Come then, away; let's ha' no more ado.

KING EDWARD IV:
But stay thee, 'tis the fruits of love I mean.

LADY ANNE:
Their aunt I am in law, in love their mother:
Then bring me to their sights; I'll bear thy blame
And take thy office from thee, on my peril.

BRAKENBURY:
With this, my lord, myself have nought to do.

Keeper:
My lord, this argues conscience in your grace;
But the respects thereof are nice and trivial,
All circumstances well considered.
You say that Edward is your brother's son:
So say we too, but not by Edward's wife;
For first he was contract to Lady Lucy--
Your mother lives a witness to that vow--
And afterward by substitute betroth'd
To Bona, sister to the King of France.
These both put by a poor petitioner,
A care-crazed mother of a many children,
A beauty-waning and distressed widow,
Even in the afternoon of her best days,
Made prize and purchase of his lustful eye,
Seduced the pitch and height of all his thoughts
To base declension and loathed bigamy
By her, in his unlawful bed, he got
This Edward, whom our manners term the prince.
More bitterly could I expostulate,
Save that, for reverence to some alive,
I give a sparing limit to my tongue.
Then, good my lord, and leave us to our fortune.

KING HENRY VI:
Master lieutenant, now that God and friends
Have shaken Edward from the regal seat,
And turn'd that black word death to banishment:
This is dear mercy, and thou seest it not.

ROMEO:
Give me a torch: I am not for this ambling;
Being but heavy, I will bear the light.

MERCUTIO:
But I have cause to pry into this pedant:
Methinks he looks as though he were in love:
Yet if thy thoughts, Bianca, be so humble
To cast thy wandering eyes on every stale,
Seize thee that list: if once I find thee ranging,
Hortensio, to what end are all these words?

HORTENSIO:
Mistake no more: I am not Licio,
Nor a musician, as I seem to be;
But one that scorn to live in this disguise,
For such a one as leaves a gentleman,
And makes a god of such a cullion:
Know, sir, that I am call'd Hortensio.

BIANCA:
Let's hear. O fie! the treble jars.

LUCENTIO:
Boldly, at least. But, O, how much is the good duke
deceived in Angelo! If ever he return and I can
speak to him, I will open my lips in vain, or
discover his government.

DUKE VINCENTIO:
My haste may not admit it;
Nor need you, on mine honour, have to do
With any scruple; your scope is as mine own
So to enforce or qualify the laws
As to your soul seems good. Give me your hand,
And let the nurse this night sit up with you;
For, I am sure, that you love me.

JULIET:
Madam, before you touch the instrument,
To learn the order of my fingering,
I must begin with rudiments of art;
To teach you gamut in a briefer sort,
More pleasant, pithy and effectual,
Than hath been taught by any of my trade:
And there it is in writing, fairly drawn.

BIANCA:
What, master, read you? first resolve me that.

LUCENTIO:
Love talks with better knowledge, and knowledge with
dearer love.

LADY CAPULET:
This is the indictment of the good Lord Hastings;
Which in a set hand fairly is engross'd,
That it may enter Mowbray's waxen coat,
And furbish new the name of John a Gaunt,
Even in the chair of state: belike he means,
Back'd by the power of Warwick, that false peer,
To aspire unto the crown and reign as king.
Earl of Northumberland, he slew thy father.
And thine, Lord Clifford; and you both have vow'd revenge
On him, his sons, his favourites and his friends.

NORTHUMBERLAND:
Not so; even through the hollow eyes of death
I spy life peering; but I dare not say
How near the tidings of our comfort is.

LORD ROSS:
No good at all that I can do for him;
Unless you call it good to pity him,
Bereft and gelded of his patrimony.

Pedant:
God save you, sir!

TRANIO:
See not your bride in these unreverent robes:
Go to my chamber; Put on clothes of mine.

PETRUCHIO:
Come, sir, I know what I know.

VOLUMNIA:
'I would he had'! 'Twas you incensed the rabble:
Cats, that can judge as fitly of his worth
As I can of those mysteries which heaven
Will not have earth to know.

BRUTUS:
Lay
A fault on us, your tribunes; that we laboured,
No impediment between, but that you must
Cast your election on him.

SICINIUS:
Assemble presently the people hither;
And when they from thy bosom pluck a flower,
Guard it, I pray thee, nurse, say I.

GLOUCESTER:
What tongueless blocks were they! would not they speak?

BUCKINGHAM:
Even that, I hope, which pleaseth God above,
And all good men of this ungovern'd isle.

GLOUCESTER:
Well thought upon; I have it here about me.
When you have done, repair to Crosby Place.
But, sir, here comes your boy;
'Twere good, methinks, to steal our marriage;
Which once perform'd, let all the world say no,
I'll keep mine own, despite of all the world.

First Citizen:
Ay, that he razed.

First Gentleman:
Why, 'twas a fear
Which oft infects the wisest: these, my lord,
I dare my life lay down and will do't, sir,
Please you to accept it, that the queen is spotless
I' the eyes of heaven and to you; I mean,
In this which you accuse her.

ANTIGONUS:
If it prove
She's otherwise, I'll keep my stables where
I lodge my wife; I'll go in couples with her;
Than when I feel and see her no farther trust her;
For every inch of woman in the world,
He were as much more villain: you, my lord, this prince is not an Edward!
He is not lolling on a lewd day-bed,
But on his knees at meditation;
Not dallying with a brace of courtezans,
But meditating with two deep divines;
Not sleeping, to engross his idle body,
But praying, to enrich his watchful soul:
Happy were England, would this gracious prince
Take on himself the sovereignty thereof:
But, sure, I fear, we shall ne'er be younger.

LUCIO:
Why, then, I do but dream on sovereignty;
Like one that stands upon a promontory,
And spies a far-off shore where he would tread,
Wishing his foot were equal with his eye,
And chides the sea that sunders him from thence,
Saying, he'll lade it dry to have his way:
So do I wish the crown, being so far off;
And so I say, I'll cut the causes off,
Flattering me with impossibilities.
My eye's too quick, my heart o'erweens too much,
Unless my hand and strength could equal them.
Well, say there is no kingdom then for Richard;
What other pleasure can the world afford?
I'll make my heaven to dream upon the crown,
And I'll be sworn you would believe my saying,
Howe'er the business goes, you have made fault
I' the boldness of your speech.

PAULINA:
That
Shall be when your first queen's again in breath;
Never till then.

HORTENSIO:
For both our sakes, I would that word were true.

PETRUCHIO:
A combless cock, so Kate will be my hen.

KATHARINA:
Had I a glass, I would.

PETRUCHIO:
Why, no.

VOLUMNIA:
He must, and will
Prithee now, say you will, and go about it.

MENENIUS:
What is this? sport?

LEONTES:
Go, do our bidding; hence!

First Lord:
The higher powers forbid!

PAULINA:
Here's ado,
To lock up honesty and honour from
The access of gentle visitors!
Is't lawful, pray you,
To see her women? any of them? Emilia?

Gaoler:
So please you, madam,
I must be held a rancorous enemy.
Cannot a plain man live and think no harm,
But thus his simple truth must be abused
By silken, sly, insinuating Jacks?

RIVERS:
Tyrants themselves wept when it was reported.

DORSET:
Comfort, my liege; and all things are in readiness.

QUEEN ELIZABETH:
How canst thou woo her?

KING RICHARD II:
Discomfortable cousin! know'st thou not
That when the searching eye of heaven is hid,
Behind the globe, that lights the lower world,
Then thieves and robbers range abroad unseen
In murders and in outrage, boldly here;
But when from under this terrestrial ball
He fires the proud tops of the eastern pines
And darts his light through every guilty hole,
Then murders, treasons and detested sins,
The cloak of night being pluck'd from off their backs,
Stand bare and naked, trembling at themselves?
So when this thief, this traitor, Bolingbroke: their fortunes both are weigh'd:
In your lord's scale is nothing but himself,
And some few vanities that make him light;
But in the balance of great Bolingbroke, covering your fearful land
With hard bright steel and hearts harder than steel.
White-beards have arm'd their thin and hairless scalps
Against thy majesty; boys, with women's voices,
Strive to speak big and clap their female joints
In stiff unwieldy arms against thy crown:
The very beadsmen learn to bend their bows
Of double-fatal yew against thy state;
Yea, and much more: but I was born so high,
Our aery buildeth in the cedar's top,
And chattering pies in dismal discords sung.
Thy mother felt more than a mother's pain,
And, yet brought forth less than a mother's hope,
To wit, an indigested and deformed lump,
Not like the fruit of such a goodly tree.
Teeth hadst thou in thy head when thou wast born,
To signify thou camest to bite the world:
And, if thou darest.

KING EDWARD IV:
But Warwick's king is Edward's prisoner:
And, gallant Warwick, do but answer this:
What is the matter?

Nurse:
Now, afore God, 'tis shame such wrongs are borne
In him, a royal prince, and many moe
Of noble blood in this declining land.
The king is not at the palace; he is gone aboard a
new ship to purge melancholy and air himself: for,
if thou beest capable of things serious, thou must
know the king is full of grief.

Shepard:
So 'tis said, sir; about his son, that should have
married a shepherd's daughter.

CLARENCE:
For this one speech Lord Hastings well deserves
To have the heir of the Lord Hungerford.

KING EDWARD IV:
No more than from my soul I mourn for yours.

QUEEN ELIZABETH:
My lords, when you shall know--as in this rage,
Provoked by him, you cannot--the great danger
Which this man's life did owe you, you'll rejoice
That he is thus cut off. Please it your honours
To call me to your senate, I'll deliver
Myself your loyal servant, your physician,
Your most obedient counsellor, yet that dare
Less appear so in comforting your evils,
Than such as most seem yours: I say, I come
From your good queen.

LEONTES:
How! gone!

Servant:
He hath songs for man or woman, of all sizes; no
milliner can so fit his customers with gloves: he
has the prettiest love-songs for maids; so without
bawdry, which is strange; with such delicate
burthens of dildos and fadings, 'jump her and thump
her;' and where some stretch-mouthed rascal would,
as it were, mean mischief and break a foul gap into
the matter, he makes the maid to answer 'Whoop, do me no harm, good man.'

POLIXENES:
Pray, Master Barnardine, awake till you are
executed, and sleep afterwards.

ABHORSON:
Truly, the souls of men are full of dread:
Ye cannot reason almost with a man
That looks not heavily and full of fear.

Third Citizen:
He's one honest enough: would all the rest were so!

MENENIUS:
I tell thee, man, 'tis better with me now
Than when I met thee last where now we meet:
Then was I going prisoner to the Tower,
From whence this present day he is deliver'd?
We are not furnish'd like Bohemia's son,
Nor shall appear in Sicilia.

CAMILLO:
Swear his thought over
By each particular star in heaven and
By all their influences, you may as well
Forbid the sea for to obey the moon
As or by oath remove or counsel shake
The fabric of his folly, whose foundation
Is piled upon his faith and will continue
The standing of his body.

AUFIDIUS:

CORIOLANUS:
It is but needful:
Mercy is not itself, that oft looks so;
Pardon is still the nurse of second woe:
But yet,--poor Claudio! There is no remedy.
Come, sir.

Third Citizen:
Better it were a brother died at once,
Than that a sister, by redeeming him,
Should die for ever.

ANGELO:
From thee, even from thy virtue!
What's this, what's this? Is this her fault or mine?
The tempter or the tempted, who sins most?
Ha!
Not she: nor doth she tempt: but it is I
That, lying by the violet in the sun,
Do as the carrion does, not as the flower,
Corrupt with virtuous season. Can it be
That modesty may more betray our sense
Than woman's lightness? Having waste ground enough,
Shall we desire to raze the sanctuary
And pitch our evils there? O, fie, fie! what, are you mad?

JULIET:
I have.

Nurse:
Faith, here it is.
Romeo is banish'd; and all the world to nothing!
Ha!
Hath she forgot already that brave prince,
Edward, her lord, whom I, some three months since,
Stabb'd in my angry mood at Tewksbury?
A sweeter and a lovelier gentleman,
Framed in the prodigality of nature,
Young, valiant, wise, and, no doubt, right royal,
The spacious world cannot again afford
And will she yet debase her eyes on me,
That cropp'd the golden prime of this sweet prince,
And made her widow to a woful bed?
On me, whose all not equals Edward's moiety?
On me, that halt and am unshapen thus?
My dukedom to a beggarly denier,
I do mistake my person all this while:
I live with bread like you, feel want,
Taste grief, need friends: subjected thus,
How can you say to me, I am a king?

FLORIZEL:
We are not, sir, nor are we like to be;
The stars, I see, will kiss the valleys first:
The odds for high and low's alike.

LEONTES:
Bear the boy hence; he shall not come about her;
Away with him! and let her sport herself
With that she's big with; for 'tis Polixenes
Has made thee swell thus.

HERMIONE:
Who is't that calls? is it my lady mother?
Is she not down so late, or up so early?
What unaccustom'd cause procures her hither?

LADY ANNE:
I would I knew thy heart.

GLOUCESTER:
Clarence and Gloucester, love my lovely queen;
And kiss your princely nephew, brothers both.

CLARENCE:
Alas! sir, it is worse for me than so;
For I have ever verified my friends,
Of whom he's chief, with all the size that verity
Would without lapsing suffer: nay, sometimes,
Like to a dismal clangour heard from far,
'Warwick, revenge! brother, revenge my death!'
So, underneath the belly of their steeds,
That stain'd their fetlocks in his smoking blood,
The noble gentleman gave up the ghost.

WARWICK:
King Lewis, I here protest, in sight of heaven,
And by the royalties of both your bloods,
Currents that spring from one most gracious head,
And by the worth and honour of himself,
Comprising all that may be sworn or said,
His coming hither hath no further scope
Than for his lineal royalties and to beg
Enfranchisement immediate on his knees:
Which on thy royal party granted once,
His glittering arms he will commend to rust,
His barbed steeds to stables, and his heart
To faithful service of your majesty.
This swears he, as he is a prince, is just;
And, as the jest did glance away from me,
'Tis a spell, you see, of much power: you know the
way home again.

SICINIUS:
Go, call the people:
in whose name myself
Attach thee as a traitorous innovator,
A foe to the public weal: obey, I charge thee,
Whate'er it bodes, henceforward will I bear
Upon my target three fair-shining suns.

RICHARD:
You are old enough now, and yet, methinks, it should not,
For he hath still been tried a holy man.
Famous Plantagenet, most gracious prince,
Lend favourable ears to our request;
And pardon us the interruption
Of thy devotion and right Christian zeal.

GLOUCESTER:
What, would you make me mad? Am not I Christopher
Sly, old Sly's son of Burtonheath, by birth a
pedlar, by education a cardmaker, by transmutation a
bear-herd, and now by present profession a tinker?
Ask Marian Hacket, the fat ale-wife of Wincot, if
she know me not: if she say I am not fourteen pence
on the score for sheer ale, score me up for the
lyingest knave in Christendom. What! I am not
bestraught: here's--

Third Servant:
O, yes, it doth; a thousand-fold it doth.
And to conclude, we have 'greed so well together,
That upon Sunday is the wedding-day.

DUKE VINCENTIO:
Why should he die, sir?

POMPHEY:
Tapster; a poor widow's tapster.

ESCALUS:
My lord, you do me shameful injury,
Falsely to draw me in these vile suspects.

GLOUCESTER:

KING EDWARD IV:
To tell thee plain, I aim to lie with thee.

PERDITA:
No, my good lord.

HASTINGS:
I go, my lord.

PRINCE EDWARD:
Father, you cannot disinherit me:
If you be king, why should not I succeed?

KING HENRY VI:
An if he may, then am I lawful king;
For Richard, in the view of many lords,
Resign'd the crown to Henry the Fourth,
Whose heir my father was, and I am his.

YORK:
Farewell, ancient lady; farewell,
'lady, lady, lady.'

Nurse:
Hie to high fortune! Honest nurse, farewell.

LARTIUS:
O Marcius, Marcius!

First Senator:
Now, sir, come on: what was done to Elbow's wife, once more?

POMPHEY:
Tapster; a poor widow's tapster.

ESCALUS:
Lead forth and bring you back in happiness!

DUCHESS OF YORK:
Blind sight, dead life, poor mortal living ghost,
Woe's scene, world's shame, grave's due by life usurp'd,
His realm a slaughter-house, his subjects slain,
His statutes cancell'd and his treasure spent;
And yonder is the wolf that makes this spoil.
You fight in justice: then, in God's name, and the king's,
To go with Paris to Saint Peter's Church,
Shall happily make thee there a joyful bride.
I wonder at this haste; that I must wed
Ere he, that should be husband, comes to woo.
I pray you, tell me what you meant by that.

Widow:
Lord, let me never have a cause to sigh,
Till I be brought to such a silly pass!

BIANCA:
And may you prove, sir, master of your art!

LUCIO:
Friar, not I I have been drinking hard all night,
and is hanged betimes in the morning, may sleep the
sounder all the next day.

ABHORSON:
Tell him he must awake, and that quickly too.

POMPEY:
He cannot, sir; he's out at elbow.

ANGELO:
Well, let us go together.

CORIOLANUS:
Well then, I pray, your price o' the consulship?

First Citizen:
Up, sir, go with me; and I'll tell you
excellent news of your husband.

LADY ANNE:
Why, then you should discover a brace of unmeriting,
proud, violent, testy magistrates, alias fools, as
any in Rome.

VIRGILIA:
His bloody brow! O Jupiter, no blood!

VOLUMNIA:
You might have been enough the man you are,
With striving less to be so; lesser had been
The thwartings of your dispositions, if
You had not show'd them how ye were disposed
Ere they lack'd power to cross you.

CORIOLANUS:
Let go.

VOLUMNIA:
Now the red pestilence strike all trades in Rome,
And occupations perish!

CORIOLANUS:
I am attended at the cypress grove: I pray you--
'Tis south the city mills--bring me word thither
How the world goes, that to the pace of it
I may spur on my journey.

First Soldier:
Will not you go?

AUFIDIUS:
There was a man--

HERMIONE:
You look as if you held a brow of much distraction
Are you moved, my lord?

BUCKINGHAM:
Why, then I will do what your grace commands.

GLOUCESTER:
It is too heavy for your grace to wear.

YORK:
Of my kind uncle, that I know will give;
And being but a toy, which is no grief to give.

GLOUCESTER:
And, that I love the tree from whence thou sprang'st,
Witness the loving kiss I give the fruit.

KING EDWARD IV:
So other foes may set upon our backs.
Stand we in good array; for they no doubt
Will issue out again and bid us battle:
If not, I'll use the advantage of my power
And lay the summer's dust with showers of blood
Rain'd from the wounds of slaughter'd Englishmen:
The which, how far off from the mind of Bolingbroke, through our security,
Grows strong and great in substance and in power.

KING RICHARD II:
Taste of it first, as thou art wont to do.

Keeper:
My lord, I hear the Marquis Dorset's fled
To Richmond, in those parts beyond the sea
Where he abides.

KING RICHARD III:
But didst thou see them dead?

TYRREL:
Prove me, my gracious sovereign.

KING HENRY VI:
But, with the first of all your chief affairs,
Let me entreat, for I command no more,
That Margaret your queen and my son Edward
Be sent for, to return from France with speed;
For, till I see them here, by doubtful fear
My joy of liberty is half eclipsed.

CLARENCE:
Alas, poor man! a million of beating may come to a
great matter.

AUTOLYCUS:
I must confess to you, sir, I am for you: I serve as good a man as you.

First Murderer:
So when he opens his purse to give us our reward,
thy conscience flies out.

Second Murderer:
Nor you, as we are, loyal.

CLARENCE:
By heaven, fond wretch, thou knowist not what thou speak'st speak not of remedy.

FRIAR LAURENCE:
For doting, not for loving, pupil mine.

ROMEO:
More light and light; more dark and dark our woes!

Nurse:
Madam!

JULIET:
Madam, with all my heart.

GLOUCESTER:
Thine eyes, sweet lady, have infected mine.

LUCIO:
I was once before him for getting a wench with child.

LUCIO:

ISABELLA:
The better, given me by so holy a man.
Hath yet the deputy sent my brother's pardon?

DUKE OF YORK:
I pray thee, chide not; she whom I love now
Doth grace for grace and love for love allow;
The other did not so.

DUKE OF AUMERLE:
For aught I know, my lord, my mother lives.

BUCKINGHAM:
Welcome, sweet prince, to London, to your chamber.

GLOUCESTER:
I grant ye.

LADY CAPULET:
Marry, I fare well for here is cheer enough.
Where is my page? Go, villain, fetch a surgeon.

ROMEO:
Switch and spurs, switch and spurs; or I'll cry a match.

GREMIO:
Adieu, sir.

GREGORY:
The heads of the maids?

SAMPSON:

GREGORY:
That shows thee a weak slave; for the weakest goes
to the wall.

GREGORY:
But thou art not quickly moved to strike.

SAMPSON:
I mean, my lords, those powers that the queen
Hath raised in Gallia have arrived our coast
And, as we march, our strength will be augmented
In every county as we go along.
Strike up the drum; cry 'Courage!' and away.
3 KING HENRY VI

GLOUCESTER:
Well, your imprisonment shall not be long;
Meantime, this deep disgrace in brotherhood
Touches me deeper than you can imagine.

Third Servingman:
To-morrow, then, I judge a happy day.

BUCKINGHAM:
Why, then he is alive.

GLOUCESTER:
Come, let us to our holy task again.
Farewell, my lord: securely I espy
Virtue with valour couched in thine eye.
Order the trial, marshal, and begin.

Lord Marshal:
Sound, trumpets; and set forward, combatants.
Stay, the king hath thrown his warder down.

KING RICHARD II:
And let them die that age and sullens have;
For both hast thou, and both become the grave.

DUKE VINCENTIO:
Provost, a word with you!

Provost:
He will hear none: he hath evermore had the liberty
of the prison; give him leave to escape hence, he
would not: drunk many times a day, if not many days
entirely drunk. We have very oft awaked him, as if
to carry him to execution, and showed him a seeming
warrant for it: it hath not moved him at all.

DUKE VINCENTIO:
The hand that hath made you fair hath made you good:
the goodness that is cheap in beauty makes beauty
brief in goodness; but grace, being the soul of
your complexion, shall keep the body of it ever
fair. The assault that Angelo hath made to you,
fortune hath conveyed to my understanding; and, but
that frailty hath examples for his falling, I should
wonder at Angelo. How will you do to content this
substitute, and to save your brother?

ISABELLA:
Let me hear you speak farther. I have spirit to do
anything that appears not foul in the truth of my spirit.

DUKE VINCENTIO:
You will be there, I know.

DORCAS:
If to either, thou dost ill.

AUTOLYCUS:
How blessed are we that are not simple men!
Yet nature might have made me as these are,
Therefore I will not disdain.

Clown:
Prithee, son, do; for we must be gentle, now we are
gentlemen.

Clown:
I cannot do't without counters. Let me see; what am
I to buy for our sheep-shearing feast? Three pound
of sugar, five pound of currants, rice,--what will
this sister of mine do with rice? But my father
hath made her mistress of the feast, and she lays it
on. She hath made me four and twenty nose-gays for
the shearers, three-man-song-men all, and very good
ones; but they are most of them means and bases; but
one puritan amongst them, and he sings psalms to
horn-pipes. I must have saffron to colour the warden
pies; mace; dates?--none, that's out of my note;
nutmegs, seven; a race or two of ginger, but that I
may beg; four pound of prunes, and as many of
raisins o' the sun.

AUTOLYCUS:
Whether it like me or no, I am a courtier. Seest
thou not the air of the court in these enfoldings?
hath not my gait in it the measure of the court?
Sound drums and trumpets, and the king will fly.

YORK:
Why, how now, Kate! I hope thou art not mad:
This is a happier and more comely time
Than when these fellows ran about the streets,
Crying confusion.

BRUTUS:
In that there's comfort.

SICINIUS:
On the sudden,
I warrant him consul.

Fifth Citizen:
We hope to find you our friend; and therefore give
you our voices heartily.

Fourth Citizen:
You have deserved nobly of your country, and you
have not deserved nobly.

CORIOLANUS:
Cut me to pieces, Volsces; men and lads,
Stain all your edges on me. Boy! false hound!
If you have writ your annals true, 'tis there,
That, like an eagle in a dove-cote, I
Flutter'd your Volscians in Corioli:
If they set down before 's, for the remove
Bring your army; but, I think, you'll find
They've not prepared for us.

AUFIDIUS:
Do they still fly to the Roman?

Lieutenant:
Fear not our care, sir.

CAMILLO:
Sir, we have all
Great cause to give great thanks.

SICINIUS:
Go, get thee gone, thou false deluding slave,
That feed'st me with the very name of meat:
Sorrow on thee and all the pack of you,
That triumph thus upon my misery!
Go, get thee gone, I say.

PETER:
I will then give it you soundly.

DUKE VINCENTIO:
Bound by my charity and my blest order,
I come to tell you things sith then befall'n.
After the bloody fray at Wakefield fought,
Where your brave father breathed his latest gasp,
Tidings, as swiftly as the posts could run,
Were brought me of your loss and his depart.
I, then in London keeper of the king,
Who look'd full gently on his warlike queen,
That robb'd my soldiers of their heated spleen;
Or whether 'twas report of her success;
Or more than common fear of Clifford's rigour,
Who thunders to his captives blood and death,
I cannot judge: but to conclude with truth,
Their weapons like to lightning came and went;
Our soldiers', like the night-owl's lazy flight,
Or like an idle thresher with a flail,
Fell gently down, as if they struck their friends.
I cheer'd them up with justice of our cause,
With promise of his sister, and what else,
To strengthen and support King Edward's place.
O Margaret, Margaret, now thy heavy curse
Is lighted on poor Hastings' wretched head!

RATCLIFF:
No doubt, my lord.

LEONTES:
No, not these twenty years.

PERDITA:
Your pardon, sir; for this
I'll blush you thanks.

FLORIZEL:
Should I now meet my father,
He would not call me son.

CAMILLO:
Then list to me:
This follows, if you will not change your purpose
But undergo this flight, make for Sicilia,
And there present yourself and your fair princess,
For so I see she must be, 'fore Leontes:
She shall be habited as it becomes
The partner of your bed. Methinks I see
Leontes opening his free arms and weeping
His welcomes forth; asks thee the son forgiveness,
As 'twere my daughter's eyes: and, to be plain.
I think there's never a man in Christendom
That can less hide his love or hate than he;
For by his face straight shall you know his heart.

DERBY:
God make your majesty joyful as you have been!

QUEEN MARGARET:
Go, get you to your house; be gone, away!
It is the lark that sings so out of tune,
Straining harsh discords and unpleasing sharps.
Some say the lark and loathed toad change eyes,
O, now be gone; more light and light it grows.

ROMEO:
Ay, if I know the letters and the language.

Servant:
What, are they dead?

Gardener:
Pardon me, if you please; if not, I, pleased
Not to be pardon'd, am content withal.
Seek you to seize and gripe into your hands
The royalties and rights of banish'd Hereford?
Is not Gaunt dead, and doth not Hereford live?
Was not Gaunt just, and is not Harry true?
Did not the one deserve to have an heir?
Is not his heir a well-deserving son?
Take Hereford's rights away, and take from Time
His charters and his customary rights;
Let not to-morrow then ensue to-day;
There's some conceit or other likes him well,
When he doth bid good morrow with such a spirit.
I think there's never a man in Christendom
That can less hide his love or hate than he;
For by his face straight shall you know his heart.

DERBY:
But now the blood of twenty thousand men
Did triumph in my face, and they are fled;
And, till so much blood thither come again,
Have I not reason to look pale and dead?
All souls that will be safe fly from my side,
For time hath set a blot upon my pride.

DUKE VINCENTIO:
My haste may not admit it;
Nor need you, on mine honour, have to do
With any scruple; your scope is as mine own
So to enforce or qualify the laws
As to your soul seems good. Give me your hand,
And let the nurse this night sit up with you;
For, I am sure, thou art:
If murdering innocents be executing,
Why, then thou shalt not have thy husband's lands.

LADY ANNE:
No! why?  When he that is my husband now
Came to me, as I follow'd Henry's corse,
When scarce the blood was well wash'd from his hands
Which issued from my other angel husband
And that dead saint which then I weeping follow'd;
O, when, I say? Nay, good sweet Kate, be merry.
Off with my boots, you rogues! you villains, when?
It was the friar of orders grey,
As he forth walked on his way:--
Out, you rogue! you pluck my foot awry:
Take that, and mend the plucking off the other.
Be merry, Kate. Some water, here; what, ho!
Where's my spaniel Troilus? Sirrah, get you hence,
And bid my cousin Ferdinand come hither:
One, Kate, that you must kiss, and be acquainted with.
Where are my slippers? Shall I have some water?
Come, Kate, sit down; I know you have a stomach.
Will you give thanks, sweet Kate; or else shall I?
What's this? what's this?

JULIET:
What devil art thou, that dost torment me thus?
This torture should be roar'd in dismal hell.
Hath Romeo slain himself? say thou but 'I,'
And that bare vowel 'I' shall poison more
Than the death-darting eye of cockatrice:
I am not I, if there be such an I;
Or those eyes shut, that make thee answer 'I.'
If he be slain, say 'I'; or if not, no:
Brief sounds determine of my weal or woe.

DUKE VINCENTIO:
Are you a maid?

MARIANA:
Merely awry: when he did love his country,
It honour'd him.

Servant:
Madam, good hope; his grace speaks cheerfully.

QUEEN MARGARET:
Our Earl of Warwick, Edward's greatest friend.

KING LEWIS XI:
Warwick, these words have turn'd my hate to love;
And I forgive and quite forget old faults,
And joy that thou becomest King Henry's friend.

KING LEWIS XI:
Why stay we now? These soldiers shall be levied,
And thou, Hortensio,
Or Signior Gremio: I say he shall go to prison.

GREMIO:

KATHARINA:
Let me entreat, for I command no more,
That Margaret your queen and my son Edward
Be sent for, to return from France with speed;
For, till I see them here, by doubtful fear
My joy of liberty is half eclipsed.

CLARENCE:
It shall be so.

Citizens:
Come, come with me, and we will make short work;
For, by your leaves, you shall not stay alone
Till holy church incorporate two in one.

BENVOLIO:
This wind, you talk of, blows us from ourselves;
Supper is done, and we shall come too late.

LUCENTIO:
And what of all this?

BIONDELLO:
No, wench; it eats and sleeps and hath such senses
As we have, such. This gallant which thou seest
Was in the wreck; and, but he's something stain'd
With grief that's beauty's canker, thou mightst call him
A goodly person: he hath lost his fellows
And strays about to find 'em.

MIRANDA:
What is't o'clock?

BUCKINGHAM:
You have, my lord: would it might please your grace,
At our entreaties, to amend that fault!

GLOUCESTER:
By heaven, my heart is purged from grudging hate:
And with my hand I seal my true heart's love.

HASTINGS:
O monstrous, monstrous! and so falls it out
With Rivers, Vaughan, Grey: and so 'twill do
With some men else, who think themselves as safe
As thou and I; who, as thou know'st, unjustly must be spilt.

RATCLIFF:
Make haste; the bridegroom he is come already:
Make haste, make haste.
Sirrah, go you to Barthol'mew my page,
And see him dress'd in all suits like a lady:
That done, conduct him to the drunkard's chamber;
And call him 'madam,' do him obeisance.
Tell him from me, as he will win my love,
He bear himself with honourable action,
Such as he hath observed in noble ladies
Unto their lords, by them accomplished:
Such duty to the drunkard let him do
With soft low tongue and lowly courtesy,
And say 'Will't please your lordship drink a cup of sack?

Second Servant:
Will't please your honour taste of these conserves?

Third Servant:
Why, they stay at door, sir.

GREGORY:
To move is to stir; and to be valiant is to stand:
therefore, if thou art moved, thou runn'st away.

SAMPSON:
I strike quickly, being moved.

GREGORY:
That shows thee a weak slave; for the weakest goes
to the wall.

GREGORY:
To move is to stir; and to be valiant is to stand:
therefore, if thou art moved, thou runn'st away.

SAMPSON:
I strike quickly, being moved.

GREGORY:
Ay, while you live, draw your neck out o' the collar.

SAMPSON:
Draw, if you be men. Gregory, remember thy swashing blow.

BENVOLIO:
Thou, brother Montague, in Buckingham,
Northampton and in Leicestershire, shalt find
Men well inclined to hear what thou command'st:
And thou, good goddess Nature, which hast made it
So like to him that got it, if thou hast
The ordering of the mind too, 'mongst all colours
No yellow in't, lest she suspect, as he does,
Her children not her husband's!

LEONTES:
Never, Paulina; so be blest my spirit!

PAULINA:
True, too true, my lord:
The army marvell'd at it, and, in the last,
When he had carried Rome and that we look'd
For no less spoil than glory,--

AUFIDIUS:

BRUTUS:
Good or bad?

Nurse:
Ah sir! ah sir! Well, death's the end of all.

DUCHESS OF YORK:
O, let me pray before I take my death!
To thee I do commend my watchful soul,
Ere I could make thee open thy white hand
And clap thyself my love: then didst thou utter
'I am yours for ever.'

HERMIONE:
What! have I twice said well? when was't before?
I prithee, hear me speak.

All:
Caius Marcius Coriolanus!

CORIOLANUS:
No, sir,'twas never my desire yet to trouble the
poor with begging.

Third Citizen:
Better it were a brother died at once,
Than that which lives to fear: make it your comfort,
So happy is your brother.

ISABELLA:
The better, given me by so holy a man.
Hath yet the deputy sent my brother's pardon?

DUKE VINCENTIO:
Most notedly, sir.

ESCALUS:
Do you hear, sir? have you married my daughter
without asking my good will?

VINCENTIO:
I pray thee, pretty York, who told thee this?

YORK:
Why, how now, Juliet!

JULIET:
It is not truer he is Angelo
Than this is all as true as it is strange:
Nay, come away.

A Patrician:
I would they were barbarians--as they are,
Though in Rome litter'd--not Romans--as they are not,
Though calved i' the porch o' the Capitol--

MENENIUS:
If it were so,--

SICINIUS:
Where is this fellow?

Second Servingman:
Why do you say 'thwack our general;' but he was always
good enough for him.

GONZALO:
Well, let us to the king: there is that in this
fardel will make him scratch his beard.

AUTOLYCUS:
No, I can better play the orator.

MONTAGUE:
But I have reasons strong and forcible.

YORK:
I shall not sleep in quiet at the Tower.

EDWARD:
No quarrel, but a slight contention.

YORK:
Now York and Lancaster are reconciled.

EXETER:
His is the right, and therefore pardon me.

LADY CAPULET:
What is six winters? they are quickly gone.

HENRY PERCY:
The grand conspirator, Abbot of Westminster,
With clog of conscience and sour melancholy
Hath yielded up his body to the grave;
But here is Carlisle living, to abide
Thy kingly doom and sentence of his pride.

HENRY BOLINGBROKE:
My heart will sigh when I miscall it so,
Which finds it an inforced pilgrimage.

JOHN OF GAUNT:
O, no! alas, I rather hate myself
For hateful deeds committed by myself!
I am a villain: yet I lie. I am not.
Fool, of thyself speak well: fool, do not flatter.
My conscience hath a thousand several tongues,
And every tongue brings in a several tale,
And every tale condemns me for a villain.
Perjury, perjury, in the high'st degree
He hath abused your powers.

CORIOLANUS:
Prepare thy brow to frown: know'st
thou me yet?

Volsce:
Coriolanus banished!

Roman:
There hath been in Rome strange insurrections; the
people against the senators, patricians,
Together with the seal o' the senate, what
We have compounded on.

AUFIDIUS:
The very trick on't.

ANTONIO:
Do you persuade yourself that I respect you?

MARIANA:
O my good lord! Sweet Isabel, take my part;
Lend me your knees, and all my life to come
I'll lend you all my life to do you service.

DUKE OF AUMERLE:
My liege, the wound that bred this meeting here
Cannot be cured by words; therefore be still.

RICHARD:
No; God forbid your grace should be forsworn.

YORK:
Henry of Lancaster, resign thy crown.
What mutter you, or what conspire you, lords?

WARWICK:
Henry now lives in Scotland at his ease,
Where having nothing, nothing can he lose.
And as for you yourself, our quondam queen,
You have a father able to maintain you;
And better 'twere you troubled him than France.

QUEEN MARGARET:
Come, son, away; we may not linger thus.

KING HENRY VI:
How will the country for these woful chances
Misthink the king and not be satisfied!

KING HENRY VI:
Be patient, for the world is broad and wide.

ROMEO:
And we mean well in going to this mask;
But 'tis no wit to go.

HENRY PERCY:
No, but there's a woman with maid by him. You have
not heard of the proclamation, have you?

MISTRESS OVERDONE:
Thus, what with the war, what with the sweat, what
with the gallows and what with poverty, I am
custom-shrunk.
How now! a conduit, girl? what, still in tears?
Evermore showering? In one little body
Thou counterfeit'st a bark, a sea, a wind;
For still thy eyes, which I may call the sea,
Do ebb and flow with tears; the bark thy body is,
Sailing in this salt flood; the winds, thy sighs;
Who, raging with thy tears, and they with them,
Without a sudden calm, will overset
Thy tempest-tossed body. How now, wife!
Have you deliver'd to her our decree?

LADY CAPULET:
We follow thee.
Juliet, the county stays.

Nurse:
Look, look! O heavy day!

LADY ANNE:
Foul devil, for God's sake, hence, and trouble us not;
For thou hast made the happy earth thy hell,
Fill'd it with cursing cries and deep exclaims.
If thou delight to view thy heinous deeds,
Behold this pattern of thy butcheries.
O, gentlemen, see, see! dead Henry's wounds
Open their congeal'd mouths and bleed afresh!
Blush, Blush, thou lump of foul deformity;
For 'tis most dangerous.

LEONTES:
The fixture of her eye has motion in't,
As we are mock'd with art.

PAULINA:
I care not.

TYBALT:
Why, uncle, what's the matter?

Messenger:
And then he sends you word
He dreamt to-night the boar had razed his helm:
Besides, he says there are two councils held;
And that may be determined at the one
which may make you and him to rue at the other.
Therefore he sends to know your lordship's pleasure,
If presently you will take horse with him,
And from her jealous arms pluck him perforce.

YORK:
I am thine.

EXETER:
My conscience tells me he is lawful king.

KING HENRY VI:
Why, so I am, in mind; and that's enough.

Second Keeper:
Say, what art thou that talk'st of kings and queens?

KING HENRY VI:
Ay, and it makes men hate one another.

Third Servingman:
What are you, sir? what may I call your name?

PETRUCHIO:
Proceed.

Tailor:
Why, here's he that was wont to thwack our general,
Caius Marcius was
A worthy officer i' the war; but insolent,
O'ercome with pride, ambitious past all thinking,
Self-loving,--

SICINIUS:
Menenius ever, ever.

HORTENSIO:
My widow says, thus she conceives her tale.

PETRUCHIO:
It is now apparent?

Provost:
Pray, let us go.

VOLUMNIA:
More noble blows than ever thou wise words;
And for Rome's good. I'll tell thee what; yet go:
Nay, prithee, dispatch: the gentleman is half
flayed already.

AUTOLYCUS:
No, take more:
What may be sworn by, both divine and human,
Seal what I end withal! This double worship,
Where one part does disdain with cause, the other
Insult without all reason, where gentry, title, wisdom,
Cannot conclude but by the yea and no
Of general ignorance,--it must omit
Real necessities, and give way the while
To unstable slightness: purpose so barr'd,
it follows,
Nothing is done to purpose. Therefore, beseech you, so.
There is no tongue that moves, none, none i' the world,
So soon as yours could win me: so it should now,
Were there necessity in your request, although
'Twere needful I denied it. My affairs
Do even drag me homeward: which to hinder
Were in your love a whip to me; my stay
To you a charge and trouble: to save both,
Farewell, ancient lady; farewell,
'lady, lady, lady.'

Nurse:

FRIAR LAURENCE:
Romeo shall thank thee, daughter, for us both.

JULIET:
Wash they his wounds with tears: mine shall be spent,
When theirs are dry, for Romeo's banishment.

FRIAR LAURENCE:
Come, is the bride ready to go to church?

CAPULET:
Come, come, dispatch; 'tis bootless to exclaim.

HASTINGS:
If they have overheard me now, why, hanging.

CAMILLO:
Sir, my lord,
If I had thought the sight of my poor image
Would thus have wrought you,--for the stone is mine--
I'ld not have show'd it.

LEONTES:
How! dare not! do not. Do you know, and dare not?
Be intelligent to me: 'tis thereabouts;
For, to yourself, what you do know, you must.
And cannot say, you dare not. Good Camillo,
Your changed complexions are to me a mirror
Which shows me mine changed too; for I must be
A party in this alteration, finding
Myself thus alter'd with 't.

POMPEY:
Why, then thou art an executioner.

GLOUCESTER:
A blessed labour, my most sovereign liege:
Amongst this princely heap, if any here,
By false intelligence, or wrong surmise,
Hold me a foe;
If I unwittingly, or in my rage,
Have aught committed that is hardly borne
By any in this presence, I desire
To reconcile me to his friendly peace:
'Tis thought that Richmond is their admiral;
And there they hull, expecting but the aid
Of Buckingham to welcome them ashore.

KING RICHARD III:
Do then: but I'll not hear.

DUKE VINCENTIO:
Sir, I cannot tell:
We must proceed as we do find the people.

All:
Amen.

SLY:
Marry, I fare well for here is cheer enough.
Where is my wife?

BAPTISTA:
I must confess your offer is the best;
And, let your father make her the assurance,
She is your own; else, you must pardon me,
if you should die before him, where's her dower?

TRANIO:
Graybeard, thy love doth freeze.

GREMIO:
Believe me, I speak as my understanding instructs me
and as mine honesty puts it to utterance.

CAMILLO:
My gracious lord, here in the parliament
Let us assail the family of York.

WARWICK:
Tut, I have lost myself; I am not here;
This is not Romeo, he's some other where.

BENVOLIO:
Go, then; for 'tis in vain
To seek him here that means not to be found.

LUCIO:
This is no witness for Lord Angelo.

DUKE OF YORK:
Thy life hath that dishonour'd.

KING RICHARD II:
Farewell, sweet masters both; I must be gone.

LUCIO:
My lord, I dare not: Sir Pierce of Exton, who
lately came from the king, commands the contrary.

KING RICHARD III:
Here pitch our battle; hence we will not budge.

KING RICHARD III:
Ay, if you come not in the blood of others,
But mantled in your own.

ALONSO:
You cram these words into mine ears against
The stomach of my sense. Would I had never
Married my daughter there! for, coming thence,
My son is lost and, in my rate, she too,
Who is so far from Italy removed
I ne'er heard yet
That any of these bolder vices wanted
Less impudence to gainsay what they did
Than to perform it first.

HERMIONE:
There's some in hope.

GREEN:
My comfort is that heaven will take our souls
And plague injustice with the pains of hell.

HENRY BOLINGBROKE:
I pardon him, as God shall pardon me.

DUKE VINCENTIO:
They will, then, ere't be long.

Provost:
I am your butt, and I abide your shot.

NORTHUMBERLAND:
Now, afore God--God forbid I say true!--
If you do wrongfully seize Hereford's rights,
Call in the letters patent that he hath
By his attorneys-general to sue
His livery, and deny his offer'd homage,
You pluck a thousand dangers on your head,
You lose a thousand well-disposed hearts
And prick my tender patience, to those thoughts
Which honour and allegiance cannot think.

KING EDWARD IV:
See that he be convey'd unto the Tower:
And go we, brothers, to the man that took him,
To question of his apprehension.
Widow, we will consider of your suit;
And come some other time to know our mind.

LADY GREY:
Why stops my lord, shall I not hear my task?

KING EDWARD IV:
Why, then resolve me whether you will or no.

KING RICHARD III:
But didst thou see them dead?

TYRREL:
Ye shall, my Lord.

BUCKINGHAM:
No, by my troth, if I had been remember'd,
I could have given my uncle's grace a flout,
To touch his growth nearer than he touch'd mine.

DUKE VINCENTIO:
What, art thou drawn among these heartless hinds?
Turn thee, Benvolio,
Or I shall faint. A plague o' both your houses!
They have made worms' meat of me: I have it,
And soundly too: your houses!

ROMEO:
Alas, that love, so gentle in his view,
Should be so tyrannous and rough in proof!

ROMEO:
O, woe the day!

LADY ANNE:
No farther than the Tower; and, as I guess,
Upon the like devotion as yourselves,
To gratulate the gentle princes there.

QUEEN ELIZABETH:
But how long shall that title 'ever' last?

KING RICHARD II:
If thou love me, 'tis time thou wert away.

Groom:
So proudly as if he disdain'd the ground.

Shepherd:
I will tell you
If you'll bestow a small--of what you have little--
Patience awhile, you'll hear the belly's answer.

First Citizen:
We cannot, sir, we are undone already.

MENENIUS:
Note me this, good friend;
Your most grave belly was deliberate,
Not rash like his accusers, and thus answer'd:
'True is it, my incorporate friends,' quoth he, 'dost thou fall upon thy face?
Thou wilt fall backward when thou hast more wit;
Wilt thou not hide the trespass of thine own?

DUKE OF YORK:
Great Duke of Lancaster, I come to thee
From plume-pluck'd Richard; who with willing soul
Adopts thee heir, and his high sceptre yields
To the possession of thy royal hand:
Ascend his throne, descending now from him;
And long live Henry, fourth of that name!

HENRY PERCY:
His answer was, he would unto the stews,
And from the common'st creature pluck a glove,
And wear it as a favour; and with that
He would unhorse the lustiest challenger.

HENRY BOLINGBROKE:
Have thy desire.

DUKE VINCENTIO:
I do fear, too dreadful:
Sith 'twas my fault to give the people scope,
'Twould be my tyranny to strike and gall them
For what I bid them do: for we bid this be done,
And sent according to command; whiles I
Persuade this rude wretch willingly to die.

FRIAR LAURENCE:
Let me dispute with thee of thy estate.

ROMEO:
Ay me!

ROMEO:
I thought all for the best.

MERCUTIO:
Thou hast affected the fine strains of honour,
To imitate the graces of the gods;
To tear with thunder the wide cheeks o' the air,
And yet not many.

PETRUCHIO:
How but well, sir? how but well?
It were impossible I should speed amiss.

BAPTISTA:
But do you hear, sir? To leave frivolous circumstances,
I pray you, husband, be not so disquiet:
The meat was well, if you were so contented.

PETRUCHIO:
Well, sir.

Servant:
I know him not, but I have heard of him;
A merchant of incomparable wealth.

TRANIO:
Gremio, 'tis now no time to vent our love:
Listen to me, and if you speak me fair,
I'll tell thee as we pass; but this I pray,
That thou consent to marry us to-day.

BUCKINGHAM:
What says your highness to my just demand?

KING RICHARD II:
Thou hast spoke too much already: get thee gone.
Signior Baptista, you are happily met.
Sir, this is the gentleman I told you of:
I pray you, daughter, sing; or express yourself in a
more comfortable sort: if my son were my husband, I
should freelier rejoice in that absence wherein he
won honour than in the embracements of his bed where
he would show most love. When yet he was but
tender-bodied and the only son of my womb, when
youth with comeliness plucked all gaze his way, when
for a day of kings' entreaties a mother should not
sell him an hour from her beholding, I, considering
how honour would become such a person. that it was
no better than picture-like to hang by the wall, if
renown made it not stir, was pleased to let him seek
danger where he was like to find fame. To a cruel
war I sent him; from whence he returned, his brows
bound with oak. I tell thee, daughter, I sprang not
more in joy at first hearing he was a man-child
than now in first seeing he had proved himself a
man.

VIRGILIA:
Heavens thank you for't! And now, I pray you, sir, is it your will
To make a stale of me amongst these mates?

HORTENSIO:
Sir, I shall tell you. With a kind of smile,
Which ne'er I did remember: to my knowledge,
I never in my life did look on him.

GLOUCESTER:
Not I:
No, God forbid that I should wish them sever'd
Whom God hath join'd together; ay, and 'twere pity
To sunder them that yoke so well together.

KING EDWARD IV:
Ay, if yourself's remembrance wrong yourself.

QUEEN ELIZABETH:
It is determined, not concluded yet:
But so it must be, if the king miscarry.

GREY:
Now Margaret's curse is fall'n upon our heads,
For standing by when Richard stabb'd her son.

PRINCE EDWARD:
I do not sue to stand;
Pardon is all the suit I have in hand.

HORTENSIO:

KATHARINA:
No cock of mine; you crow too like a craven.

PETRUCHIO:
Peace, sirrah!

HORTENSIO:
Petruchio, go thy ways; thou hast tamed a curst shrew.

LUCENTIO:
I do assure thee, father, so it is.

HORTENSIO:
Madam, the Lady Valeria is come to visit you.

VIRGILIA:

SICINIUS:
Have you a catalogue
Of all the voices that we have procured
Set down by the poll?

AEdile:
Very well.

ANTONIO:
'Twas never merry world since, of two usuries, the
merriest was put down, and the worser allowed by
order of law a furred gown to keep him warm; and
furred with fox and lamb-skins too, to signify, that
craft, being richer than innocency, stands for the facing.

ELBOW:
Come, bring them away: if these be good people in
a commonweal that do nothing but use their abuses in
common houses, I know no law: bring them away.

ANGELO:
Now, good my lord, be not afraid of shadows.

KING RICHARD II:
Your cares set up do not pluck my cares down.
My care is loss of care, by old care done;
Your care is gain of care, by new care won:
The cares I give I have, though given away;
They tend the crown, yet still with me they stay.

HENRY BOLINGBROKE:
Norfolk, for thee remains a heavier doom,
Which I with some unwillingness pronounce:
The sly slow hours shall not determinate
The dateless limit of thy dear exile;
The hopeless word of 'never to return'
Breathe I against thee, upon pain of life.

THOMAS MOWBRAY:
Each day still better other's happiness;
Until the heavens, envying earth's good hap,
Add an immortal title to your crown!

KING RICHARD II:
I am in parliament pledge for his truth
And lasting fealty to the new-made king.

DUKE OF AUMERLE:
Yea, and to marry her, if her dowry please.

GREMIO:
Take heed, Signior Baptista!

PETRUCHIO:
Go fetch them hither: if they deny to come.

KING RICHARD III:
Art thou, indeed?

TYRREL:
If to have done the thing you gave in charge
Beget your happiness, be happy then,
For it is done, my lord.

DUCHESS OF YORK:
Alack, poor Richard! where rode he the whilst?

DUKE VINCENTIO:
What if a man bring him a hundred pound or two, to
make merry withal?

HORTENSIO:
You may go to the devil's dam: your gifts are so
good, here's none will hold you. Their love is not
so great, Hortensio, though
her father be very rich, any man is so very a fool
to be married to hell?

HORTENSIO:
Now, by the jealous queen of heaven, that kiss
I carried from thee, dear; and my true lip
Hath virgin'd it e'er since. You gods! I prate,
And the most merciless that e'er was heard of!

BAPTISTA:
Who comes with him?

Groom:
What my tongue dares not, that my heart shall say.

Keeper:
Fellow, give place; here is no longer stay.

LEONTES:
You have mistook, my lady,
Polixenes for Leontes: O thou thing!
Which I'll not call a creature of thy place,
Lest barbarism, making me the precedent,
Should a like language use to all degrees
And mannerly distinguishment leave out
Betwixt the prince and beggar: I have said
She's an adulteress.

HERMIONE:
He something seems unsettled.

POLIXENES:
How!
Away with that audacious lady! Antigonus,
I charged thee that she should not come about me:
I knew she would.

ANTIGONUS:

PAULINA:
I pray you, be acquainted with this maid;
She comes to do you good.

ISABELLA:
Doth he so seek his life?

LUCIO:
Hail to you, provost! so I think you are.

CLARENCE:
Alas, poor soul!

AUTOLYCUS:
Lawn as white as driven snow;
Cyprus black as e'er was crow;
Gloves as sweet as damask roses;
Masks for faces and for noses;
Bugle bracelet, necklace amber,
Perfume for a lady's chamber;
Golden quoifs and stomachers,
For my lads to give their dears:
Pins and poking-sticks of steel,
What maids lack from head to heel:
Come buy of me, come; come buy, come buy;
Buy lads, or else your lasses cry: Come buy.

Clown:
She being none of your flesh and blood, your flesh
and blood has not offended the king; and so your
flesh and blood is not to be punished by him. Show
those things you found about her, those secret
things, all but what she has with her: this being
done, let the law go whistle: I warrant you.

Shepherd:
Away! I say; commend me to thy mistress.

Nurse:
See where she comes from shrift with merry look.

CAPULET:
What is six winters? they are quickly gone.

HENRY BOLINGBROKE:
Of much less value is my company
Than your good words. But who comes here?

Second Citizen:
So did we all. But, come, let's home.

BRUTUS:
Raised only, that the weaker sort may wish
Good Marcius home again.

First Huntsman:
Believe me, noble lord,
I am a stranger here in Gloucestershire;
But whether they be ta'en or slain we hear not.
Welcome, my lord how far off lies your power?

EARL OF SALISBURY:
Ah, Richard, with the eyes of heavy mind
I see thy glory like a shooting star
Fall to the base earth from the firmament.
Thy sun sets weeping in the lowly west,
Witnessing storms to come, woe and unrest:
Thy friends are fled to wait upon thy foes,
And crossly to thy good all fortune goes.

HENRY BOLINGBROKE:
Why, bishop, is Norfolk dead?

BISHOP OF ELY:
To-morrow; to-day; presently; you shall have the
drum struck up this afternoon: 'tis, as it were, a
parcel of their feast, and to be executed ere they
wipe their lips.

Second Servingman:
An he had been cannibally given, he might have
broiled and eaten him too.

First Servingman:
But when goes this forward?

Third Servingman:
I would not for the wealth of all the town
Here in my house do him disparagement:
Therefore be patient, take no note of him:
It is my son, young Harry Percy,
Sent from my brother Worcester, whencesoever.
Harry, how fares your uncle?

HENRY BOLINGBROKE:
Good aunt, you wept not for our father's death;
How can we aid you with our kindred tears?

Girl:
And so will I.

QUEEN MARGARET:
Thou hadst not lived to kill a son of mine.
And thus I prophesy, that many a thousand,
Which now mistrust no parcel of my fear,
And many an old man's sigh and many a widow's,
And many an old man's sigh and many a widow's,
And many an orphan's water-standing eye--
Men for their sons, wives for their husbands,
And orphans for their parents timeless death--
Shall rue the hour that ever thou wast born.
The owl shriek'd at thy birth,--an evil sign;
The night-crow cried, aboding luckless time;
Dogs howl'd, and hideous tempest shook down trees;
The raven rook'd her on the chimney's top,
And dallies with the wind and scorns the sun.

AUTOLYCUS:
He has no equal.

SICINIUS:
Meet on the market-place. We'll attend you there:
Where, if you bring not Marcius, we'll proceed
In our first way.

MENENIUS:
The augurer tells me we shall have news to-night.

MENENIUS:
O Marcius, Marcius!
Each word thou hast spoke hath weeded from my heart
A root of ancient envy. If Jupiter
Should from yond cloud speak divine things,
And say 'Alas, it was a piteous deed!'
There, take the crown, and, with the crown, my curse;
And in thy need such comfort come to thee
As now I reap at thy too cruel hand!
Hard-hearted Clifford, take me from the world:
His head is off and sent to Angelo.

Provost:
A Bohemian born, but here nursed un and bred; one
that is a prisoner nine years old.

DUKE VINCENTIO:
Ay, with such gifts that heaven shall share with you.

AUTOLYCUS:
Are you mankind?

VOLUMNIA:
Nay,'tis true.

VOLUMNIA:
Now, pray, sir, get you gone:
You have done a brave deed. Ere you go, hear this:--
As far as doth the Capitol exceed
The meanest house in Rome, so far my son--
This lady's husband, Sir Richard Grey, was slain,
His lands then seized on by the conqueror:
Her suit is now to repossess those lands;
Which we in justice cannot well deny,
Because in quarrel of the house of York
Is as a fury to torment my soul;
And till I root out their accursed line
And leave not one alive, I live in hell.
Therefore--

RUTLAND:
But 'twas ere I was born.
Thou hast one son; for his sake pity me,
Lest in our need he might infect another
And make him of like spirit to himself.
If any such be here--
As it were sin to doubt--that love this painting
Wherein you see me smear'd; if any fear
Lesser his person than an ill report;
If any think brave death outweighs bad life
And that his country's dearer than himself;
Let him alone, or so many so minded,
Wave thus, to express his disposition,
And follow Marcius.
O, me alone! make you a sword of me?
If these shows be not outward, which of you
But is four Volsces? none of you but is
Able to bear against the great Aufidius
A shield as hard as his. A certain number,
Though thanks to all, must I select
from all: the rest
Shall bear the business in some other fight,
As cause will be obey'd. Please you to march;
And four shall quickly draw out my command,
Which men are best inclined.

COMINIUS:
Stop,
Or all will fall in broil.

CORIOLANUS:
Ha! Marcius coming home!

VOLUMNIA:
Pray, let us go.

VOLUMNIA:
I prithee, good Grumio, tell me, how goes the world?

DUCHESS OF YORK:
Art thou so bare and full of wretchedness,
And fear'st to die? famine is in thy cheeks,
And death's pale flag is not advanced there.
Tybalt, liest thou there in thy bloody sheet?
O, what more favour can I do to thee,
Than with that hand that cut thy youth in twain
To sunder his that was thine enemy?
Forgive me, cousin! Ah, dear Juliet,
Why art thou yet so fair? shall I believe
That unsubstantial death is amorous,
And that the spoil got on the Antiates
Was ne'er distributed.
What, will he not to bed?

First Watchman:

JULIET:
That may be must be, love, on Thursday next.

JULIET:
Feeling so the loss,
Cannot choose but ever weep the friend.

LADY CAPULET:
What, are you married?

MARIANA:
Fear me not.

KING RICHARD III:
Then, by myself--

QUEEN ELIZABETH:
Come, come.

First Citizen:
Neighbour, well met: whither away so fast?

BENVOLIO:
There lies that Tybalt.

First Citizen:
I the great toe! why the great toe?

MENENIUS:
I know it is the moon.

KATHARINA:
Well have you heard, but something hard of hearing:
They call me Katharina that do talk of me.

QUEEN ELIZABETH:
Be brief, lest that be process of thy kindness
Last longer telling than thy kindness' date.

KING RICHARD III:
Fly to the duke:
Post thou to Salisbury
When thou comest thither--
Dull, unmindful villain,
Why stand'st thou still, and go'st not to the duke?

ESCALUS:
Such a nature,
Tickled with good success, disdains the shadow
Which he treads on at noon: but I do wonder
His insolence can brook to be commanded
Under Cominius.

SICINIUS:
Why either were you ignorant to see't,
Or, seeing it, of such childish friendliness
To yield your voices?

BRUTUS:
Get you hence instantly, and tell those friends,
They have chose a consul that will from them take
Their liberties; make them of no more voice
Than dogs that are as often beat for barking
As therefore kept to do so.

SEBASTIAN:
As many vouched rarities are.

GONZALO:
Nay, that's not so.

ELBOW:
Come your ways, sir; come.

POMPEY:
Come; fear you not: good counsellors lack no
clients: though you change your place, you need not
change your trade; I'll be your tapster still.
Courage! there will be pity taken on you: you that
have worn your eyes almost out in the service, you
will be considered.

MISTRESS OVERDONE:
Well, well, no more of that.

CORIOLANUS:
Scratches with briers,
Scars to move laughter only.

MENENIUS:
On both sides more respect.

SICINIUS:
How often he had met you, sword to sword;
That of all things upon the earth he hated
Your person most, that he would pawn his fortunes
To hopeless restitution, so he might
Be call'd your vanquisher.

CORIOLANUS:
O the gods!

COMINIUS:
They say she's mad.

BRUTUS:
Manifest treason!

SICINIUS:
You have paid the heavens your function, and the
prisoner the very debt of your calling. I have
laboured for the poor gentleman to the extremest
shore of my modesty: but my brother justice have I
found so severe, that he hath forced me to tell him
he is indeed Justice.

DUKE VINCENTIO:
It is now apparent?

Provost:
Is it your will Claudio shall die tomorrow?

ANGELO:
I show it most of all when I show justice;
For then I pity those I do not know,
Which a dismiss'd offence would after gall;
And do him right that, answering one foul wrong,
Lives not to act another. Be satisfied;
Your brother dies to-morrow; be content.

ISABELLA:
How say you sir? Can you deny all this?

BRAKENBURY:
In God's name, speak: when is the royal day?

BUCKINGHAM:
Go, go, up to the leads; the lord mayor knocks.
Welcome my lord; I dance attendance here;
I think the duke will not be spoke withal.
Here comes his servant: how now, Catesby,
What says he?

NORTHUMBERLAND:
Have you forgot the Duke of Hereford, Rainold Lord Cobham,
That late broke from the Duke of Exeter,
His brother, Archbishop late of Canterbury,
Sir Thomas Erpingham, Sir John Ramston,
Sir John Norbery, Sir Robert Waterton and Francis Quoint,
All these well furnish'd by the Duke of Bretagne
With eight tall ships, three thousand men of war,
Are making hither with all due expedience
And shortly mean to touch our northern shore:
Perhaps they had ere this, but that they stay
The first departing of the king for Ireland.
If then we shall shake off our slavish yoke,
Imp out our drooping country's broken wing,
Redeem from broking pawn the blemish'd crown,
Wipe off the dust that hides our sceptre's gilt
And make high majesty look like itself,
Away with me in post to Ravenspurgh.

NORTHUMBERLAND:
My lord, will't please you pass along?
Myself and my good cousin Buckingham
Will to your mother, to entreat of her
To meet you at the Tower and welcome you.
Be not ta'en tardy by unwise delay.

DUCHESS OF YORK:
No matter, then, who see it;
I will be satisfied; let me see the writing.

DUKE OF AUMERLE:
Some honest Christian trust me with a gage
That Norfolk lies: here do I throw down this,
If he may be repeal'd, to try his honour.

HENRY BOLINGBROKE:
Bagot, forbear; thou shalt not take it up.

ANTIGONUS:
I am glad at heart
To be so rid o' the business.

ANTIGONUS:
La you now, you hear:
When she will take the rein I let her run;
But she'll not stumble.

PAULINA:
Sir, my name is Lucio; well known to the duke.

GLOUCESTER:
If you thrive well, bring them to Baynard's Castle;
Where you shall find me well accompanied
With reverend fathers and well-learned bishops.

BUCKINGHAM:
No, so God help me, they spake not a word;
But, like dumb statues or breathing stones,
Gazed each on other, and look'd deadly pale.
Which when I saw, I reprehended them;
And ask'd the mayor what meant this wilful silence:
His answer was, the people were not wont
To be spoke to but by the recorder.
Then he was urged to tell my tale again,
'Thus saith the duke, thus hath the duke inferr'd;'
But nothing spake in warrant from himself.
When he had done, some followers of mine own,
At the lower end of the hall, hurl'd up their caps,
And some ten voices cried 'God save King Richard!'
And thus I took the vantage of those few,
'Thanks, gentle citizens and friends,' quoth I;
'This general applause and loving shout
Argues your wisdoms and your love to Richard:'
And even here brake off, and came away.

GLOUCESTER:

KING EDWARD IV:
It were no less; but yet I'll make a pause.

GLOUCESTER:
She may, my lord, for--

GLOUCESTER:
The queen is valued thirty thousand strong,
And Somerset, with Oxford fled to her:
If she be curst, it is for policy,
For she's not froward, but modest as the dove;
She is not hot, but temperate as the morn;
For patience she will prove a second Grissel,
And Roman Lucrece for her chastity:
And to conclude, the shepherd's homely curds,
His cold thin drink out of his leather bottle.
His wonted sleep under a fresh tree's shade,
All which secure and sweetly he enjoys,
Is far beyond a prince's delicates,
His viands sparkling in a golden cup,
His body couched in a curious bed,
When care, mistrust, and treason waits on him.

Son:
How will my mother for a father's death
Take on with me and ne'er be satisfied!

KING HENRY VI:
How will the country for these woful chances
Misthink the king and not be satisfied!

Son:
I'll bear thee hence; and let them fight that will,
For I have murdered where I should not kill.

KING HENRY VI:
Ah, Exeter!

WARWICK:
Be Duke of Lancaster; let him be king.

KING HENRY VI:
Peace, thou! and give King Henry leave to speak.
Now, therefore, be it known to noble Lewis,
That Henry, sole possessor of my love,
Is of a king become a banish'd man,
And forced to live in Scotland a forlorn;
While proud ambitious Edward Duke of York
Usurps the regal title and the seat
Of England's true-anointed lawful king.
This is the cause that I, poor Margaret,
With this my son, Prince Edward, Henry's heir,
Am come to crave thy just and lawful aid;
And if thou fail us, all our hope is done:
Scotland hath will to help, but cannot help;
Our people and our peers are both misled,
Our treasures seized, our soldiers put to flight,
And, as it were far off sound thou Lord Hastings,
How doth the prince, and my young son of York?

BRAKENBURY:
Why looks your grace so heavily today?

CLARENCE:
Methoughts that I had broken from the Tower,
And was embark'd to cross to Burgundy;
And, in my company, my brother Gloucester;
Who from my cabin tempted me to walk
Upon the hatches: thence we looked toward England,
And cited up a thousand fearful times,
During the wars of York and Lancaster
That had befall'n us. As we paced along
Upon the giddy footing of the hatches,
Methought that Gloucester stumbled; and, in falling,
Struck me, that thought to stay him, overboard,
Into the tumbling billows of the main.
Lord, Lord! methought, what pain it was to drown!
What dreadful noise of waters in mine ears!
What ugly sights of death within mine eyes!
Methought I had; and often did I strive
To yield the ghost: but still the envious flood
Kept in my soul, and would not let it forth
To seek the empty, vast and wandering air;
But smother'd it within my panting bulk,
Which almost burst to belch it in the sea.

BRAKENBURY:
What was your dream? I long to hear you tell it.

CLARENCE:
Father of Warwick, know you what this means?
Look here, I throw my infamy at thee
I will not ruinate my father's house,
Who gave his blood to lime the stones together,
And set up Lancaster. Why, trow'st thou, Warwick,
That Clarence is so harsh, so blunt, unnatural,
To bend the fatal instruments of war
Against his brother and his lawful king?
Perhaps thou wilt object my holy oath:
To keep that oath were more impiety
Than Jephthah's, when he sacrificed his daughter.
I am so sorry for my trespass made
That, to deserve well at my brother's hands,
I here proclaim myself thy mortal foe,
With resolution, wheresoe'er I meet thee--
As I will meet thee, if thou stir abroad--
To plague thee for thy foul misleading me.
And so, proud-hearted Warwick, I defy thee,
And to my humble seat conform myself.

KING LEWIS XI:
Warwick, what are thy news? and yours, fair queen?

QUEEN ELIZABETH:
Shall I speak ill of him that is my husband?
Ah, poor my lord, what tongue shall smooth thy name,
When I, that censure him, do so offend,
Let mine own judgment pattern out my death,
And nothing come in partial. Sir, he must die.

ESCALUS:
How? what?

GLOUCESTER:
More wonderful, when angels are so angry.
Vouchsafe, divine perfection of a woman,
Of these supposed-evils, to give me leave,
By circumstance, to curse thy cursed self.

GLOUCESTER:
He may command me as my sovereign;
But you have power in me as in a kinsman.

YORK:
Farewell, our brother.

LEONTES:
Once more, good night, kind lords and gentlemen.
O Thou, whose captain I account myself,
Look on my forces with a gracious eye;
Put in their hands thy bruising irons of wrath,
That they may crush down with a heavy fall
The usurping helmets of our adversaries!
Make us thy ministers of chastisement,
That we may arm us to encounter it.

DUKE VINCENTIO:
It lies much in your holding up. Haste you speedily
to Angelo: if for this night he entreat you to his
bed, give him promise of satisfaction. I will
presently to Saint Luke's: there, at the moated
grange, resides this dejected Mariana. At that
place call upon me; and dispatch with Angelo, that
it may be quickly.

ISABELLA:
O, that it were as like as it is true!

DUCHESS OF YORK:
If so, then be not tongue-tied: go with me.
Go, fellow, go, return unto thy lord;
Bid him not fear the separated councils
His honour and myself are at the one,
And at the other is my servant Catesby
Where nothing can proceed that toucheth us
Whereof I shall not have intelligence.
Tell him his fears are shallow, wanting instance:
And for his dreams, I wonder he is so fond
To trust the mockery of unquiet slumbers
To fly the boar before the boar pursues,
Were to incense the boar to follow us
And make pursuit where he did mean no chase.
Go, bid thy master rise and come to me
And we will both together to the Tower,
By the suggestion of the queen's allies;
But now, I tell thee--keep it to thyself--
This day those enemies are put to death,
And I for comfort have but one false glass,
Which grieves me when I see my shame in him.
Thou art a banish'd man,
And forced to live in Scotland a forlorn;
While proud ambitious Edward Duke of York
Usurps the regal title and the seat
Of England's true-anointed lawful king.
This is the day wherein I wish'd to fall
By the false faith of him I trusted most;
This, this All-Souls' day, fellows, is it not?

CLIFFORD:
How hast thou offended?
Where is Lucentio?
I tell you, sir, she bears me fair in hand.

HORTENSIO:
Sir, I think
You have heard of my poor services, i' the love
That I have borne your father?

FLORIZEL:
And those that you'll procure from King Leontes--

CAMILLO:
He's irremoveable,
Resolved for flight. Now were I happy, if
His going I could frame to serve my turn,
Save him from danger, do him love and honour,
Purchase the sight again of dear Sicilia
And that unhappy king, my master, whom
I so much thirst to see.

FLORIZEL:
Should I now meet my father,
He would not call me son.

CAMILLO:
Who have we here?
We'll make an instrument of this, omit
Nothing may give us aid.

AUTOLYCUS:
Neither.

DORCAS:
Whither?

KING RICHARD II:
What doth she say, my Lord of Buckingham?

BUCKINGHAM:
Have done! for shame, if not for charity.

QUEEN ELIZABETH:
Flatter my sorrows with report of it;
Tell me what state, what dignity, what honour,
Canst thou demise to any child of mine?

TYRREL:
'Tis very late, she'll not come down to-night:
It is too rash, too unadvised, too sudden;
Too like the lightning, which doth cease to be
Ere one can say 'It lightens.' Sweet, good night!
This bud of love, by summer's ripening breath,
May prove a beauteous flower when next we meet.
Good night, good Captain Blunt. Come gentlemen,
Let us survey the vantage of the field
Call for some men of sound direction
Let's want no discipline, make no delay,
For, lords, to-morrow is a busy day.

RICHARD:
Ay, now my sovereign speaketh like himself;
And now will I be Edward's champion.

HASTINGS:
'Tis done, my gracious lord.

GLOUCESTER:
You may deny that you were not the cause
Of my Lord Hastings' late imprisonment.

RIVERS:
My Lord of York will still be cross in talk:
Uncle, my brother mocks both you and me;
Because that I am little, like an ape,
He thinks that you should bear me on your shoulders.

BUCKINGHAM:
Northumberland comes back from Bolingbroke.

QUEEN:
'Tis a spell, you see, of much power: you know the
way home again.

SICINIUS:
Consul! what consul?

MENENIUS:
What is this?
Your knees to me? to your corrected son?
Then let the pebbles on the hungry beach
Fillip the stars; then let the mutinous winds
Strike the proud cedars 'gainst the fiery sun;
Murdering impossibility, to make
What cannot be, slight work.

VOLUMNIA:
He must, and will
Prithee now, say you will, and go about it.

CORIOLANUS:
Ay, as an ostler, that for the poorest piece
Will bear the knave by the volume. The honour'd gods
Keep Rome in safety, and the chairs of justice
Supplied with worthy men! plant love among 's!
Throng our large temples with the shows of peace,
And not our streets with war!

First Senator:
There's no more to be said, but he is banish'd,
As enemy to the people and his country:
It shall be so.

CAMILLO:
She hangs about his neck:
If she pertain to life let her speak too.

POLIXENES:
What is the business?

Servant:
Here is the head of that ignoble traitor,
The dangerous and unsuspected Hastings.

GLOUCESTER:
Why, what's a moveable?

KATHARINA:
A very mean meaning.

Widow:
She shall not.

POLIXENES:
We were, fair queen,
Two lads that thought there was no more behind
But such a day to-morrow as to-day,
That ne'er shall dine unless thou yield the crown.

KING HENRY VI:
Let's levy men, and beat him back again.

ROMEO:

JULIET:
I' faith, I am sorry that thou art not well.
Sweet, sweet, sweet nurse, tell me, what says my love?

Nurse:
His name is Barnardine.

DUKE VINCENTIO:
The contents of this is the return of the duke: you
shall anon over-read it at your pleasure; where you
shall find, within these two days he will be here.

DUKE VINCENTIO:
That will I.
Go, Biondello, let's away.

LUCENTIO:
Look where he comes.

BIONDELLO:
I cannot tell: the world is grown so bad,
That wrens make prey where eagles dare not perch:
Since every Jack became a gentleman
There's many a gentle person made a Jack.

QUEEN ELIZABETH:
Shall I be tempted of the devil thus?

KING RICHARD II:
And shall I have?

HENRY BOLINGBROKE:
Withdraw yourselves, and leave us here alone.
What is the matter, uncle? speak;
Recover breath; tell us how near is danger,
That we may bring you something on the way.

DUKE VINCENTIO:
He hath some meaning in his mad attire:
We will persuade him, be it possible,
To put on better ere he go to church.

BAPTISTA:
I am glad on 't: then we shall ha' means to vent
Our musty superfluity. See, our best elders.

First Senator:
Then, worthy Marcius,
Attend upon Cominius to these wars.

COMINIUS:
Therefore, most absolute sir, if thou wilt not, be but sworn my love,
And I'll be sworn you would believe my saying,
Howe'er you lean to the nayward.

LEONTES:
My true Paulina,
We honour you with trouble: but we came
To see the statue of our queen: your gallery
Have we pass'd through, not without much content
In many singularities; but we saw not
That which my daughter came to look upon,
The statue of her mother.

PAULINA:
Well, be't so, prithee.

AUTOLYCUS:
I am sorry that by hanging thee I can
But shorten thy life one week. And thou, fresh piece
Of excellent witchcraft, who of force must know
The royal fool thou copest with,--

Shepherd:
Fie, fie, fie, fie!
This is the way to kindle, not to quench.

First Senator:
Be it so; go back: the virtue of your name
Is not here passable.

MENENIUS:
What more fearful?

Messenger:

Provost:
This shall be done, good father, presently.
But Barnardine must die this afternoon:
And how shall we continue Claudio,
To save me from the danger that might come
If he were known alive?

DUKE OF YORK:
Tut, tut!
Grace me no grace, nor uncle me no uncle:
I am no breeching scholar in the schools;
