As that is desperate which we would prevent.
If, rather than to marry County Paris,
Thou hast the strength of will to slay thyself,
Then is it likely thou wilt undertake
A thing like death to chide away this shame,
That copest with death himself to scape from it:
And, if thou darest.

GREMIO:
Tut, I can counterfeit the deep tragedian;
Speak and look back, and pry on every side,
Tremble and start at wagging of a straw,
Intending deep suspicion: ghastly looks
Are at my service, like enforced smiles;
And both are ready in their offices,
At any time, to grace my stratagems.
But what, is Catesby gone?

GLOUCESTER:
Sweet saint, for charity, be not so curst.

LADY CAPULET:
Nurse, will you go with me?

VOLUMNIA:
Take my prayers with you.
I would the fool were married to her grave!

CAPULET:
O heavens! what stuff is here

POMPEY:
I spy comfort; I cry bail. Here's a gentleman and a
friend of mine.

PETRUCHIO:
Thy father! O villain! he is a sailmaker in Bergamo.

BAPTISTA:
After my death the one half of my heart;
Do't not, thou split'st thine own.

CAMILLO:

FLORIZEL:
By his command
Have I here touch'd Sicilia and from him
Give you all greetings that a king, at friend,
Can send his brother: and, but infirmity
Which waits upon worn times hath something seized
His wish'd ability, he had himself
The lands and waters 'twixt your throne and his
Measured to look upon you; whom he loves--
He bade me say so--more than all the sceptres
And those that bear them living.

LEONTES:
O, not by much.

PAULINA:
I'll have no bigger: this doth fit the time,
And aid thee in this doubtful shock of arms:
But on thy side I may not be too forward
Lest, being over-proud in sap and blood,
With too much riches it confound itself:
Had he done so, himself had borne the crown,
Which waste of idle hours hath quite thrown down.

Servant:
O sir, I shall be hated to report it!
The prince your son, with mere conceit and fear
Of the queen's speed, is gone.

QUEEN ELIZABETH:
Come, come, we know you well enough.

MENENIUS:
Hence, rotten thing! or I shall shake thy bones
Out of thy garments.

SICINIUS:
Meet on the market-place.

BRUTUS:
Let's to the Capitol;
And carry with us ears and eyes for the time,
But hearts for the event.

SICINIUS:
One thus descended,
That hath beside well in his person wrought
To be set high in place, we did commend
To your remembrances: but you have found,
Scaling his present bearing with his past,
That he's your fixed enemy, and revoke
Your sudden approbation.

BRUTUS:
Has said enough.

SICINIUS:
Should they not,
Well might they fester 'gainst ingratitude,
And tent themselves with death. Of all the horses,
Whereof we have ta'en good and good store, of all
The treasure in this field achieved and city,
We render you the tenth, to be ta'en forth,
Before the common distribution, at
Your only choice.

MARCIUS:
Will the time serve to tell? I do not think.
Where is the Earl of Wiltshire dead?

SIR STEPHEN SCROOP:
More health and happiness betide my liege
Than can my care-tuned tongue deliver him!

KING RICHARD III:
I swear--

QUEEN MARGARET:
What, weeping-ripe, my Lord Northumberland.

NORTHUMBERLAND:
First, to thy sacred state wish I all happiness.
The next news is, I have to London sent
The heads of Oxford, Salisbury, Blunt, and Kent:
The manner of their taking may appear
At large discoursed in this paper here.

HENRY BOLINGBROKE:
With all my heart; and much it joys me too,
To see you are become so penitent.
Tressel and Berkeley, go along with me.

NORTHUMBERLAND:
How far is it to Berkeley? and what stir
Keeps good old York there with his men of war?

HENRY BOLINGBROKE:
Thank, gentle uncle. Come, lords, away.
To fight with Glendower and his complices:
Awhile to work, and after holiday.

KING RICHARD II:
Say that again.
The shadow of my sorrow! ha! let's see:
'Tis meet so, daughter: but lest you do repent,
As that the sin hath brought you to this shame,
Which sorrow is always towards ourselves, not heaven,
Showing we would not spare heaven as we love it,
But as we stand in fear,--

DUKE VINCENTIO:

VINCENTIO:
He wants advice.

Provost:
Lest I revenge. What, myself upon myself?
Alack. I love myself. Wherefore?  for any good
That I myself have done unto myself?
O, no! alas, I rather hate myself
For hateful deeds committed by myself!
I am a villain: yet I lie. I am not.
Fool, of thyself speak well: fool, do not flatter.
My conscience hath a thousand several tongues,
And every tongue brings in a several tale,
And every tale condemns me for a villain.
Perjury, perjury, in the high'st degree
Murder, stem murder, in the direst degree;
All several sins, all used in each degree,
Throng to the bar, crying all, Guilty! guilty!
I shall despair. There is no creature loves me;
And if I die, no soul shall pity me:
Nay, I knew by his face that there was something in
him: he had, sir, a kind of face, methought,--I
cannot tell how to term it.

First Murderer:
Offended us you have not, but the king.

AUTOLYCUS:
This is most likely!

ISABELLA:
O, peace, Paulina!
Thou shouldst not scape me here.
Officious, and not valiant, you have shamed me
In your condemned seconds.

COMINIUS:
Pray now, no more: my mother,
Who has a charter to extol her blood,
When she does praise me grieves me. I have done
As you have done; that's what I can; induced
As you have been; that's for my country:
He that has the two fair daughters: is't he you mean?

TRANIO:
What is he, Biondello?

BIONDELLO:
Why, no.

MARCIUS:
They have ta'en note of us: keep on your way.

MENENIUS:
That's my brave boy!

VOLUMNIA:
He had rather see the swords, and hear a drum, than
look upon his school-master.

VALERIA:
Well, then, imprison him: if imprisonment be the
due of a bawd, Pompey,
howsoever you colour it in being a tapster, are you
not? come, tell me true: it shall be the better for you.

ROMEO:
Your plaintain-leaf is excellent for that.

BENVOLIO:
Come, come, my son, I'll bring thee on thy way:
Had I thy youth and cause, I would not stay.

HORTENSIO:
Her father is Baptista Minola,
As if he did contemn what he requested
Should be in them to give.

GLOUCESTER:
Have done thy charm, thou hateful wither'd hag!

QUEEN ELIZABETH:
With all our harts.

BUCKINGHAM:
Well, let that pass. Dorset is fled to Richmond.

BUCKINGHAM:
No, so God help me, they spake not a word;
But, like a misbehaved and sullen wench,
Thou pout'st upon thy fortune and thy love:
Take heed, Signior Baptista, lest you be
cony-catched in this business: I dare swear this
is the right Vincentio.

Pedant:
Ay, sir, they be ready: the oats have eaten the horses.

KATHARINA:
Where did you dwell when I was King of England?

Second Keeper:
Why linger we? let us lay hands upon him.

ESCALUS:
My lord,
Go then; and with a countenance as clear
As friendship wears at feasts, keep with Bohemia
And with your queen. I am his cupbearer:
If from me he have wholesome beverage,
Account me not your servant.

LEONTES:
Let be, let be.
Would I were dead! if God's good will were so;
For what is in this world but grief and woe?
O God! methinks it were a happy life,
To be no better than a homely swain;
To sit upon a hill, as I do now,
Taking the measure of an unmade grave.

FRIAR LAURENCE:
On Thursday, sir? the time is very short.

PARIS:
Thy face is mine, and thou hast slander'd it.

JULIET:
Tell me not, friar, that thou hear'st of this,
Unless thou tell me how I may prevent it:
If, in thy wisdom, thou canst give no help,
Do thou but call my resolution wise,
And with this knife I'll help it presently.
God join'd my heart and Romeo's, thou our hands;
And ere thou bid good night, to quit their griefs,
Tell thou the lamentable tale of me
And send the hearers weeping to their beds:
For why, the senseless brands will sympathize
The heavy accent of thy moving tongue
And in compassion weep the fire out;
And some will mourn in ashes, some coal-black,
For the deposing of a king
And cracking the strong warrant of an oath,
Mark'd with a blot, damn'd in the book of heaven:
Nay, wherefore should they, since that I myself
Find in myself no pity to myself?
Methought the souls of all that I had murder'd
Came to my tent; and every one did threat
To-morrow's vengeance on the head of Richard.

RATCLIFF:
Not I, my lord.

DUCHESS OF YORK:
He shall be endured:
What, goodman boy! I say, he shall: go to;
Am I the master here, or you? go to.
You'll not endure him! God shall mend my soul!
You'll make a mutiny among my guests!
You will set cock-a-hoop! you'll be the man!

TYBALT:
What, drawn, and talk of peace! I hate the word,
As I hate hell, all Montagues, and thee:
Have at thee, coward!

First Citizen:
Neighbour, well met: whither away so fast?

VOLUMNIA:
O, sir, Lucentio slipp'd me like his greyhound,
Which runs himself and catches for his master.

PETRUCHIO:
Thy wit is a very bitter sweeting; it is a most
sharp sauce.

ROMEO:
What less than dooms-day is the prince's doom?

FRIAR LAURENCE:
So smile the heavens upon this holy act,
That after hours with sorrow chide us not!

ROMEO:
There is no truth at all i' the oracle:
The sessions shall proceed: this is mere falsehood.

Servant:
Up.

ROMEO:
I warrant thee, my man's as true as steel.

NURSE:
Well, sir.

CORIOLANUS:
Hail to you, provost! so I think you are.

CLARENCE:
O, no! thou diest, though I the sicker be.

KING RICHARD III:
Kind Tyrrel, am I happy in thy news?

TYRREL:
Ay, my good lord:--my lord, I should say rather;
'Tis my deserving, and I do entreat it.

DUKE VINCENTIO:
Words against me? this is a good friar, belike!
And to set on this wretched woman here
Against our substitute! Let this friar be found.

LUCENTIO:
That will I.
Go, Biondello?

BIONDELLO:
Tut, that's a foolish observation:
Richard, be Duke of Gloucester. Now to London,
To see these honours in possession.
3 KING HENRY VI

RIVERS:
And so doth mine: I muse why she's at liberty.

GLOUCESTER:
Catesby, we come. Lords, will you go with us?

RIVERS:
But, madam, where is Warwick then become?

QUEEN:
Give me mine own again; 'twere no good part
To take on me to keep and kill thy heart.
So, now the gates are ope: now prove good seconds:
'Tis well borne up.
I have not sounded him, nor he deliver'd
His gracious pleasure any way therein:
But you, my noble lords.

QUEEN:
'Twill be deliver'd back on good condition.

AUFIDIUS:
The senate, Coriolanus, are well pleased
To make thee consul.

Fifth Citizen:
We hope to find you our friend; and therefore give
you our voices heartily.

Fourth Citizen:
You have been a scourge to her enemies, you have
been a rod to her friends; you have not indeed loved
the common people.

CORIOLANUS:
Shall I be tempted of the devil thus?

KING RICHARD III:
And came I not at last to comfort you?

DUKE VINCENTIO:
Are you so brave? I'll have you talked with anon.

Third Servingman:
What have you to do here, fellow? Pray you, avoid
the house.

CORIOLANUS:
Have I had children's voices?

First Senator:
A noble fellow, I warrant him.

Second Citizen:
So did we all. But, come, let's home.
I ever said we were i' the wrong when we banished
him.

First Servingman:
Why, then thou shalt not have thy husband's lands.

LADY CAPULET:
Ay, sir, very well.

POMPEY:
I spy comfort; I cry bail. Here's a gentleman and a
friend of mine.

LUCIO:
My lord, I have from Oxford sent to London
The heads of Brocas and Sir Bennet Seely,
Two of the dangerous consorted traitors
That sought at Oxford thy dire overthrow.

HENRY BOLINGBROKE:
Rise up, good aunt.

DUKE VINCENTIO:
It is extempore, from my mother-wit.

KATHARINA:
A very mean meaning.

Widow:
Your husband, being troubled with a shrew,
Measures my husband's sorrow by his woe:
And now you know my meaning,

KATHARINA:
Why, sir, I trust I may have leave to speak;
And speak I will; I am no child, no babe:
Your betters have endured me say my mind,
And if you break the ice and do this feat,
Achieve the elder, set the younger free
For our access, whose hap shall be to have her
Will not so graceless be to be ingrate.

HORTENSIO:
Gremio, 'tis known my father hath no less
Than those she placeth highest! So, farewell.

DUKE VINCENTIO:
Bound by my charity and my blest order,
I come to visit the afflicted spirits
Here in the prison, father,
There died this morning of a cruel fever
One Ragozine, a most notorious pirate,
A man of Claudio's years; his beard and head
Just of his colour. What if we do omit
This reprobate till he were well inclined;
And satisfy the deputy with the visage
Of Ragozine, a most notorious pirate,
A man of Claudio's years; his beard and head
Just of his colour. What if we do omit
This reprobate till he were well inclined;
And satisfy the deputy with the visage
Of Ragozine, more like to Claudio?

DUCHESS OF YORK:
Who hath committed them?

Messenger:
The citizens of Corioli have issued,
And given to Lartius and to Marcius battle:
I saw our party to their trenches driven,
And then I'll set upon him.

NORTHUMBERLAND:
Nay, never bear me hence, dispatch me here,
Here sheathe thy sword, I'll pardon thee my death:
What, wilt thou not? then, Clarence, do it thou.

CLARENCE:
In God's name, lead; your king's name be obey'd:
And what God will, that let your king perform;
And what he will, I humbly yield unto.
3 KING HENRY VI

GLOUCESTER:
Margaret.

QUEEN MARGARET:
I told your majesty as much before:
This proveth Edward's love and Warwick's honesty.

WARWICK:
Tell him from me that he hath done me wrong,
And therefore I'll uncrown him ere't be long.
There's thy reward: be gone.

LUCIO:
I warrant your honour.

DUKE OF AUMERLE:
Unto my mother's prayers I bend my knee.

DUCHESS OF YORK:
At that sad stop, my lord,
You scarce can right me throughly then to say
You did mistake.

LEONTES:
Thou dost, and think'st it much to tread the ooze
Of the salt deep,
To run upon the sharp wind of the north,
He slily stole away and left his men:
Whereat the great Lord of Northumberland, he slew thy father.
And thine, Lord Clifford; and you both have vow'd revenge
On him, his sons, his favourites and his friends.

NORTHUMBERLAND:
Nor I.

CLIFFORD:
I would your highness would depart the field:
The queen hath best success when you are absent.

QUEEN ELIZABETH:
Flatter my sorrows with report of it;
Tell me what state, what dignity, what honour,
Canst thou demise to any child of mine?

KING RICHARD II:
Mine ear is open and my heart prepared;
The worst is worldly loss thou canst unfold.
Say, is my kingdom lost? why, 'twas my care
And what loss is it to be rid of care?
Strives Bolingbroke to be as great as we?
Greater he shall not be; if he serve God,
We'll serve Him too and be his fellow so:
Revolt our subjects? that we cannot mend;
They break their faith to God as well as us:
Cry woe, destruction, ruin and decay:
The worst is death, and death will have his day.

SIR STEPHEN SCROOP:
Sweet love, I see, changing his property,
Turns to the sourest and most deadly hate:
Again uncurse their souls; their peace is made
With heads, and not with hands; those whom you curse
Have felt the worst of death's destroying wound
And lie full low, graved in the hollow ground.

DUKE VINCENTIO:
He professes to have received no sinister measure
from his judge, but most willingly humbles himself
to the determination of justice: yet had he framed
to himself, by the instruction of his frailty, many
deceiving promises of life; which I by my good
leisure have discredited to him, and now is he
resolved to die.

CLARENCE:
Alas! what poor ability's in me
To do him good?

LUCIO:
Good even. Friar, where's the provost?

Provost:
I would do more than that, if more were needful.
Look, here comes one: a gentlewoman of mine,
Who, falling in the flaws of her own youth,
Hath blister'd her report: she is with child;
And he that got it, sentenced; a young man
More fit to do another such offence
Than die for this.

HENRY PERCY:
Aumerle that was;
But that is lost for being Richard's friend,
And, madam,
I must be held a rancorous enemy.
Cannot a plain man live and think no harm,
But thus his simple truth must be abused
By silken, sly, insinuating Jacks?

RICHARD:
What, not an oath? nay, then the world goes hard
When Clifford cannot spare his friends an oath.
I know by that he's dead; and, by my soul,
If this right hand would buy two hour's life,
That I in all despite might rail at him,
This hand should chop it off, and with the
issuing blood
Stifle the villain whose unstanched thirst
York and young Rutland could not satisfy.

WARWICK:
Why should you sigh, my lord?

LEONTES:
I ne'er heard yet
That any of these bolder vices wanted
Less impudence to gainsay what they did
Than to perform it first.

HERMIONE:
What wisdom stirs amongst you? Come, sir, now
I am for you.

KATHARINA:
I care not:
It is an heretic that makes the fire,
Not she which burns in't. I'll not call you tyrant;
But this most cruel usage of your queen,
Not able to endure the sight of day,
But self-affrighted tremble at his sin.
Not all the water in the rough rude sea
Can wash the balm off from an anointed king;
The breath of worldly men cannot depose
The deputy elected by the Lord:
For every man that Bolingbroke hath press'd
To lift shrewd steel against our golden crown,
God for his Richard hath in heavenly pay
A glorious angel: then, if angels fight,
Weak men must fall, for heaven still guards the right.
Welcome, my lord, to this brave town of York.
3 KING HENRY VI

KING EDWARD IV:
Ay, but the mustard is too hot a little.

KATHARINA:
Let me entreat you.

BIONDELLO:
Hope I may choose, sir.

FLORIZEL:
See, your guests approach:
Address yourself to entertain them sprightly,
And let's be red with mirth.

Shepherd:
Come, your hand;
And what you do, do it unfeignedly.

QUEEN ELIZABETH:
Oh, he is young and his minority
Is put unto the trust of Richard Gloucester,
A man that loves not me, nor none of you.

FROTH:
All this is true.

POMPEY:
O, the better, sir; for he that drinks all night,
and I will have more time to prepare me, or they
shall beat out my brains with billets: I will not
consent to die this day, that's certain.

DUKE OF YORK:
Vex not yourself, nor strive not with your breath;
For all in vain comes counsel to his ear.

DUCHESS OF YORK:
Why, York, what wilt thou do?
Wilt thou not, Jule?' it stinted and said 'Ay.'

JULIET:
O, break, my heart! poor bankrupt, break at once!
To prison, eyes, ne'er look on liberty!
Vile earth, to earth resign; end motion here;
And thou and Romeo press one heavy bier!

Nurse:
And from my soul too;
Or else beshrew them both.

DUCHESS OF YORK:
Why, madam, so, no doubt, he is.

Lord:
Heaven cease this idle humour in your honour!
O, that I were a glove upon that hand,
That I yet know not?

FRIAR LAURENCE:
That's a good deed. If thou mayest discern by that
which is left of him what he is, fetch me to the
sight of him.

AUTOLYCUS:
Prosper you, sweet sir!
Your purse is not hot enough to purchase your spice.
I'll be at charges for a looking-glass,
And entertain some score or two of tailors,
To study fashions to adorn my body:
Since I am crept in favour with myself,
Will maintain it with some little cost.
But first I'll do my errand. The good queen,
For she is good, hath brought you forth a daughter;
Here 'tis; commends it to your blessing.

LEONTES:
That 'once' I see by your good father's speed
Will come on very slowly. I am sorry,
Most sorry, you have broken from his liking
Where you were tied in duty, and as sorry
Your choice is not so rich in worth as beauty,
That you might well enjoy her.

FLORIZEL:
Fortune speed us!
Thus we set on, Camillo, to visit Bohemia, on
the like occasion whereon my services are now on
foot, you shall see, as I have said, great
difference betwixt our Bohemia and your Sicilia.

CAMILLO:
It is fifteen years since I saw my country: though
I have for the most part been aired abroad, I
desire to lay my bones there. Besides, the penitent
king, my master, hath sent for me; to whose feeling
sorrows I might be some allay, or I o'erween to
think so, which is another spur to my departure.

POLIXENES:
My best Camillo! We must disguise ourselves.

AUTOLYCUS:

Clown:
Dost lack any money? I have a little money for thee.

AUTOLYCUS:
Neither.

DORCAS:
Me too, let me go thither.

JULIET:
Ay, my lord;
It's nine o'clock.

ABHORSON:
Truly, sir, I would desire you to clap into your
prayers; for, look you, sir, he bid me knock him and rap
him soundly, sir: well, was it fit for a servant to
use his master so, being perhaps, for aught I see,
two and thirty, a pip out? Whom would to God I had
well knock'd at first, Then had not Grumio come by the worst.

PETRUCHIO:
It cannot be avoided but by this;
It will not be avoided but by this;
It will not be avoided but by this.
Therefore, good mother,--I must can you so--
Be the attorney of my love to her:
Plead what I will be, not what I have been;
Not my deserts, but what I will deserve:
Urge the necessity and state of times,
And be not peevish-fond in great designs.

QUEEN ELIZABETH:
As much to him, else is his thanks too much.

RICHARD:
Ay, like a dastard and a treacherous coward,
As thou didst kill our tender brother Rutland;
But ere sunset I'll make thee curse the deed.

QUEEN ELIZABETH:
Oh, who shall hinder me to wail and weep,
To chide at your extremes it not becomes me:
O, much I fear some ill unlucky thing.

BALTHASAR:
Then she is well, and nothing can be ill:
Her body sleeps in Capel's monument,
And her immortal part with angels lives.
I saw her laid low in her kindred's vault,
And presently took post to tell it you:
O, pardon me for bringing these ill news,
Since you did leave it for my office, sir.

Citizen:
He is, and feasts the nobles of the state
At his house this night.

HENRY BOLINGBROKE:
My gracious lord, here in the parliament
Let us assail the family of York.

PRINCE:
What fear is this which startles in our ears?

First Watchman:

JULIET:
I have.

SICINIUS:
'Tis death for any one in Mantua
To come to Padua. Know you not the cause?
Your ships are stay'd at Venice, and the duke,
He shall not make me there a joyful bride.
I wonder at this haste; that I must wed
Ere he, that should be husband, comes to woo.
I pray you, uncle, give me this dagger.

GLOUCESTER:
Lady, you know no rules of charity,
Which renders good for bad, blessings for curses.

LADY ANNE:
All men, I hope, live so.

GLOUCESTER:
Alack, why am I sent for to a king,
Before I have shook off the regal thoughts
Wherewith I reign'd? I hardly yet have learn'd
To insinuate, flatter, bow, and bend my limbs:
Give sorrow leave awhile to tutor me
To this submission. Yet I well remember
The favours of these men: were they not mine?
Did they not sometime cry, 'all hail!' to me?
So Judas did to Christ: but he, in twelve,
Found truth in all but one: I, in twelve thousand, none.
God save the king! although I be not he;
And yet, incaged in so small a verge,
The waste is no whit lesser than thy land.
O, had it been a stranger, not my child,
To smooth his fault I should have been more mild:
A partial slander sought I to avoid,
And in the sentence my own life destroy'd.
Alas, I am not coop'd here for defence!
I will away towards Barnet presently,
And bid thee battle, Edward, if thou darest.

DUCHESS OF YORK:
I will bethink me: come again tomorrow.

ISABELLA:
Please you to do't,
I'll take it as a peril to my soul,
My soul the father; and these two beget
A generation of still-breeding thoughts,
And these same thoughts people this little world,
This precious stone set in the silver sea,
Which serves it in the office of a wall,
Or as a moat defensive to a house,
Against the envy of less happier lands,
This blessed plot, this earth, this realm, this England,
This nurse, this teeming womb of royal kings,
Fear'd by their breed and famous by their birth,
Renowned for their deeds as far from home,
For Christian service and true chivalry,
As is the bud bit with an envious worm,
Ere he express himself, or move the people
With what he would say, let him feel your sword,
Which we will second. When he lies along,
After your way his tale pronounced shall bury
His reasons with his body.

POLIXENES:
This is the hag, when maids lie on their backs,
That presses them and learns them first to bear,
Making them women of good carriage:
This is she--

ROMEO:
Thou detestable maw, thou womb of death,
Gorged with the dearest morsel of the earth,
To me for justice and rough chastisement;
And, by my troth, if I had been remember'd,
I could have given my uncle's grace a flout,
To touch his growth nearer than he touch'd mine.

DUKE VINCENTIO:
Lives my sweet son?

BIANCA:
Why, gentlemen, you do me double wrong,
To strive for that which resteth in my choice:
I am no traitor's uncle; and that word 'grace.'
In an ungracious mouth is but profane.
Why have those banish'd and forbidden legs
Dared once to touch a dust of England's ground?
But then more 'why?' why have they dared to march
So many miles upon her peaceful bosom,
Frighting her pale-faced villages with war
And ostentation of despised arms?
Comest thou because the anointed king is hence?
Why, foolish boy, the king is left behind,
And in my loyal bosom lies his power.
Were I but now the lord of such hot youth
As when brave Gaunt, thy father, and myself
Rescued the Black Prince, that young Mars of men,
From forth the ranks of many thousand French,
O, then how quickly should this arm of mine.
Now prisoner to the palsy, chastise thee
And minister correction to thy fault!

HENRY BOLINGBROKE:
Nay, it is ten times strange.

ISABELLA:
Yet show some pity.

ANGELO:
What are you, sir? Has the porter his eyes in his
head; that he gives entrance to such companions?
Pray, get you out.

CORIOLANUS:
Now thou'rt troublesome.

Second Servingman:
And I shall.

Third Servingman:
What, will the aspiring blood of Lancaster
Sink in the ground? I thought it would have mounted.
See how my sword weeps for the poor king's death!
O, may such purple tears be alway shed
From those that wish the downfall of our house!
The tiger now hath seized the gentle hind;
Insulting tyranny begins to jet
Upon the innocent and aweless throne:
Welcome, destruction, death, and massacre!
I see, as in a map, the end of all.

DUKE VINCENTIO:
O, ay, what else?

SICINIUS:
'Tis burnt; and so is all the meat.
What dogs are these! Where is the rascal cook?
How durst you, villains, bring it from the dresser,
And serve it thus to me that love it not?
Theretake it to you, trenchers, cups, and all;
You heedless joltheads and unmanner'd slaves!
What, do you tremble? are you all afraid?
Alas, I look'd when some of you should say,
I was too strict to make mine own away;
But you gave leave to my unwilling tongue
Against my will to do myself this wrong.

KING RICHARD III:
And came I not at last to comfort you?

DUKE VINCENTIO:
There was a time when all the body's members
Rebell'd against the belly, thus accused it:
That only like a gulf it did remain
I' the midst o' the body, idle and unactive,
Still cupboarding the viand, never bearing
Like labour with the rest, where is your darling Rutland?
Look, York: I stain'd this napkin with the blood
That valiant Clifford, with his rapier's point,
Made issue from the bosom of the boy;
And let his manly face, which promiseth
Successful fortune, steel thy melting heart
To hold thine own and leave thine own with him.

YORK:
Why, how now, sons and brother! at a strife?
What is your quarrel? how began it first?

EDWARD:
Then strike up drums: God and Saint George for us!

WARWICK:
I wonder how our princely father 'scaped,
Or whether he be 'scaped away or no
From Clifford's and Northumberland's pursuit:
Had he been ta'en, we should have heard the news;
Had he been slain, we should have heard the news;
Or had he 'scaped, methinks we should have heard
The happy tidings of his good escape.
How fares my brother? why is he so sad?

RICHARD:
Ay, like a dastard and a treacherous coward,
As thou didst kill our tender brother Rutland;
And here's the heart that triumphs in their death
And cheers these hands that slew thy sire and brother
To execute the like upon thyself;
And so, have at thee!

RICHMOND:
Cry mercy, lords and watchful gentlemen,
That you have ta'en a due and wary note upon't:
With whispering and most guilty diligence,
In action all of precept, he did show me
The way twice o'er.

GREMIO:
O this learning, what a thing it is!

PETRUCHIO:
A whoreson beetle-headed, flap-ear'd knave!
Come, Kate, and wash, and welcome heartily.
You whoreson villain! will you let it fall?

KATHARINA:
So may you by my dull and heavy eye,
My tongue hath but a heavier tale to say.
I play the torturer, by small and small
To lengthen out the worst that must be spoken:
Your uncle York is join'd with Bolingbroke.

Keeper:
My lord, there needs no such apology:
I rather do beseech you, which is the readiest way
To the house of Signior Baptista Minola?

BIONDELLO:
I have heard, but not believed,
the spirits o' the dead
May walk again: if such thing be, thy mother
Appear'd to me last night, for ne'er was dream
So like a waking. To me comes a creature,
Sometimes her head on one side, some another;
I never saw a vessel of like sorrow,
So fill'd and so becoming: in pure white robes,
Like very sanctity, she did approach
My cabin where I lay; thrice bow'd before me,
And gasping to begin some speech, her eyes
Became two spouts: the fury spent, anon
Did this break-from her: 'Good Antigonus,
Since fate, against thy better disposition,
Hath made a shameful conquest of itself.
Ah, would the scandal vanish with my life,
How happy then were my ensuing death!

DUKE OF AUMERLE:
My liege, one word.

PRINCE EDWARD:
Speak like a true knight, so defend thee heaven!

HENRY BOLINGBROKE:
Stand all apart,
And show fair duty to his majesty.
Farewell, my coz.

BENVOLIO:
I'll have no halves; I'll bear it all myself.
How now! who is it?

Clown:
Lay it by too: another.

AUTOLYCUS:
Well, no more of it, Master Froth: farewell.
Come you hither to me, Master tapster. What's your
name, Master tapster?

POMPHEY:
Tapster; a poor widow's tapster.

ESCALUS:
My lord, I like not of this flight of Edward's;
For doubtless Burgundy will yield him help,
And we shall have more wars before 't be long.
As Henry's late presaging prophecy
Did glad my heart with hope of this young Richmond,
So doth my heart misgive me, in these conflicts
What may befall him, to his harm and ours:
Therefore, Lord Oxford, to prevent the worst,
Forthwith we'll send him hence to Brittany,
Till storms be past of civil enmity.
Weep, wretched man, I'll aid thee tear for tear;
And let our hearts and eyes, like civil war,
Be blind with tears, and break o'ercharged with grief.

Father:
How will my wife for slaughter of my son
Shed seas of tears and ne'er be satisfied!

KING HENRY VI:
Warwick and Clarence give me both your hands:
Now join your hands, and with your hands your hearts,
That no dissension hinder government:
I make you both protectors of this land,
The Duke of York, to know what pricks you on
To take advantage of the absent time
And fright our native peace with self-born arms.

HENRY BOLINGBROKE:
Villain, thou know'st no law of God nor man:
No beast so fierce but knows some touch of pity.

GLOUCESTER:
But you have all the vantage of her wrong.
I was too hot to do somebody good,
That is too cold in thinking of it now.
Marry, would the word 'farewell' have lengthen'd hours
And added years to his short banishment,
He should have found his uncle Gaunt a father,
To rouse his wrongs and chase them to the bay.
I am denied to sue my livery here,
And yet my letters-patents give me leave:
My father's death--

QUEEN ELIZABETH:
Send to her, by the man that slew her brothers,
A pair of bleeding-hearts; thereon engrave
Edward and York; then haply she will weep:
Therefore present to her--as sometime Margaret
Did to thy father, steep'd in Rutland's blood,--
A handkerchief; which, say to her, did drain
The purple sap from her sweet brother's body
And bid her dry her weeping eyes therewith.
If this inducement force her not to love,
Send her a story of thy noble acts;
Tell her thou madest away her uncle Clarence,
Her uncle Rivers; yea, and, for her sake,
Madest quick conveyance with her good aunt Anne.

KING RICHARD III:
Cold friends to Richard: what do they in the north,
When they should serve their sovereign in the west?

STANLEY:
My lord, dispatch; read o'er these articles.

KING RICHARD III:
Stay, madam; I must speak a word with you.
Catesby hath sounded Hastings in our business,
And finds the testy gentleman so hot,
As he will lose his head ere give consent
His master's son, as worshipful as he terms it,
Shall lose the royalty of England's throne.

BUCKINGHAM:
Give me some breath, some little pause, my lord
Before I positively herein:
I will resolve your grace immediately.

CATESBY:
My lord: he doth entreat your grace;
To visit him to-morrow or next day:
He is within, with two right reverend fathers,
Divinely bent to meditation;
And no worldly suit would he be moved,
To draw him from his holy exercise.

BUCKINGHAM:
Sorry I am my noble cousin should
Suspect me, that I mean no good to him:
By heaven, brat, I'll plague ye for that word.

QUEEN:
'Tis better using France than trusting France:
Let us be back'd with God and with the seas
Which He hath given for fence impregnable,
And with their helps only defend ourselves;
In them and in ourselves our safety lies.

CLARENCE:
In God's name, what art thou?

Second Murderer:
'Zounds! who is there?

RATCLIFF:
Your highness shall repose you at the Tower:
Then where you please, and shall be thought most fit
For your best health and recreation.

PRINCE EDWARD:
Good lords, make all the speedy haste you may.
Say, uncle Gloucester, if our brother come,
Where shall we sojourn till our coronation?

GLOUCESTER:
Marry, that with no man here he is offended;
For, were he, he had shown it in his looks.

DERBY:
But now the blood of twenty thousand men
Did triumph in my face, and they are fled;
And, till so much blood thither come again,
Have I not reason to look pale and dead?
All souls that will be safe fly from my side,
For time hath set a blot upon my pride.

DUKE VINCENTIO:
Provost, a word with you.
Catesby hath sounded Hastings in our business,
And finds the testy gentleman so hot,
As he will lose his head ere give consent
His master's son, as worshipful as he terms it,
Shall lose the royalty of England's throne.

BUCKINGHAM:
Then know, it is your fault that you resign
The supreme seat, the throne majestical,
The scepter'd office of your ancestors,
Your state of fortune and your due of birth,
The lineal glory of your royal house,
To the corruption of a blemished stock:
Whilst, in the mildness of your sleepy thoughts,
Which here we waken to our country's good,
This noble isle doth want her proper limbs;
Her face defaced with scars of infamy,
Her royal stock graft with ignoble plants,
And almost shoulder'd in the swallowing gulf
Of blind forgetfulness and dark oblivion.
Which to recure, we heartily solicit
Your gracious self to take on you the charge
And kingly government of this your land,
Not as protector, steward, substitute,
Or lowly factor for another's gain;
But as successively from blood to blood,
Your right of birth, your empery, your own.
For this, consorted with the citizens,
Your very worshipful and loving friends,
And by their vehement instigation,
In this just suit come I to move your grace.

GLOUCESTER:
Say that I did all this for love of her.

PETRUCHIO:

HORTENSIO:
Well, you'll answer this one day. Fare ye well.

LUCIO:
Marry, and did; but if you be remember'd,
I did not well I meant well. All my services
You have paid home: but that you have vouchsafed,
With your crown'd brother and these your contracted
Heirs of your kingdoms, my poor house to visit,
It is a comforter.

ANTONIO:
Let's all sink with the king.

POLIXENES:
No longer stay.

JULIET:
O, but impatience waiteth on true sorrow.
And see where comes the breeder of my sorrow!

KING LEWIS XI:
Why stay we to be baited
With one that wants her wits?

VOLUMNIA:
He had rather see the swords, and hear a drum, than
look upon his school-master.

VALERIA:
Well, then, no more but this: go, gentle Catesby,
What says he?

CATESBY:
What, my old worshipful old master? yes, marry, sir:
see where he looks out of the window.

VINCENTIO:
Hark, Petruchio; she says she'll see thee
hang'd first.

TRANIO:
Why, true; he means to make a puppet of me.

PETRUCHIO:
Nay, I dare not swear it.

Shepherd:
His garments are rich, but he wears
them not handsomely.

Clown:
Advocate's the court-word for a pheasant: say you
have none.

Shepherd:
Prithee, son, do; for we must be gentle, now we are
gentlemen.

Clown:
So you have: but I was a gentleman born before my
father; for the king's son took me by the hand, and
called me brother; and then the two kings called my
father brother; and then the two kings called my
father brother; and then the two kings called my
father brother; and then the prince my brother and
the princess my sister called my father father; and
so we wept, and there was the first gentleman-like
tears that ever we shed.

Shepherd:
Why, boy, how is it?

GLOUCESTER:
Suspicion always haunts the guilty mind;
The thief doth fear each bush an officer.

KING HENRY VI:
Here at the palace I will rest awhile.
Cousin, I am too young to be your father,
Though you are old enough to be my heir.
What you will have it named, even that it is;
And so it shall be so for me.

Pursuivant:
The better that your lordship please to ask.

LADY ANNE:
To take is not to give.

BRUTUS:
Mark you that?

CORIOLANUS:
I would they were abed!

MENENIUS:
Sham it be put to that?

First Senator:
Behold our patroness, the life of Rome!
Call all your tribes together, praise the gods,
And make triumphant fires; strew flowers before them:
Unshout the noise that banish'd Marcius,
Repeal him with the welcome of his mother;
Cry 'Welcome, ladies, welcome!'

All:
Farewell, old Gaunt.
Thou goest to Coventry, there to behold
Our cousin Hereford and fell Mowbray fight:
O, sit my husband's wrongs on Hereford's spear,
That it may be this day read over in Paul's.
And mark how well the sequel hangs together:
Eleven hours I spent to write it over,
For yesternight by Catesby was it brought me;
The precedent was full as long a-doing:
And yet within these five hours lived Lord Hastings,
Untainted, unexamined, free, at liberty
Here's a good world the while! Why who's so gross,
That seeth not this palpable device?
Yet who's so blind, but says he sees it not?
Bad is the world; and all will come to nought,
When such bad dealings must be seen in thought.

GLOUCESTER:
What, think You we are Turks or infidels?
Or that we would, against the form of law,
Proceed thus rashly to the villain's death,
But that the extreme peril of the case,
The peace of England and our persons' safety,
Enforced us to this execution?

Lord Mayor:
Amen.

BUCKINGHAM:
Refuse not, mighty lord, this proffer'd love.

CATESBY:
My liege, I'll knock once more to summon them.

Mayor:
My lords, before it pleased his majesty
To raise my state to title of a queen,
Do me but right, and you must all confess
That I was not ignoble of descent;
And meaner than myself have had like fortune.
But as this title honours me and mine,
So your dislike, to whom I would be pleasing,
Doth cloud my joys with danger and with sorrow.

KING EDWARD IV:
An easy task; 'tis but to love a king.

GLOUCESTER:

BUCKINGHAM:
You are too senseless--obstinate, my lord,
Suddenly taken; and hath sent post haste
To entreat your majesty to visit him.

KING RICHARD III:
Well, but what's o'clock?

CATESBY:
Call them again, my lord, and accept their suit.

ANOTHER:
Do, good my lord, be not angry.

GONZALO:
My lord, I have from Oxford sent to London
The heads of Brocas and Sir Bennet Seely,
Two of the dangerous consorted traitors
That sought at Oxford thy dire overthrow.

HENRY BOLINGBROKE:
So far be mine, my most redoubted lord,
As my true service shall deserve your love.

RIVERS:
By heaven, my heart is purged from grudging hate:
And with my hand I seal my true heart's love.

HASTINGS:
And so swear I, my lord

KING EDWARD IV:
So, lie thou there: die thou, and die our fear;
For Warwick was a bug that fear'd us all.
Now, Montague, sit fast; I seek for thee,
That God, the law, my honour and her love,
Can make seem pleasing to her tender years?

KING RICHARD II:
So two, together weeping, make one woe.
Weep thou for me in France, I for thee here;
Better far off than near, be ne'er the near.
Go, count thy way with sighs; I mine with groans.

QUEEN:
Banish us both and send the king with me.

GLOUCESTER:
If I thou protector of this damned strumpet--
Tellest thou me of 'ifs'?  Thou art a traitor:
Off with his son George's head!

NORFOLK:
And I to Norfolk with my followers.

MONTAGUE:
To help King Edward in his time of storm,
As every loyal subject ought to do.

COMINIUS:
O Marcius, Marcius!

First Senator:
Our army's in the field
We never yet made doubt but Rome was ready
To answer us.

AUFIDIUS:
The town is ta'en!

First Soldier:
Following the fliers at the very heels,
With them he enters; who, upon the sudden,
Clapp'd to their gates: he is himself alone,
To answer all the city.

COMINIUS:
O, ay, Curtis, ay: and therefore fire, fire; cast
on no water.

CURTIS:
Both of one horse?

GRUMIO:
A piece of ice: if thou doubt it, thou mayst slide
from my shoulder to my heel with no greater a run
but my head and my neck. A fire good Curtis.

CURTIS:
Why, a horse.

GRUMIO:
A cold world, Curtis, in every office but thine; and
therefore fire: do thy duty, and have thy duty; for
my master and mistress are almost frozen to death.

WARWICK:
Then Clarence is at hand, I hear his drum.

SOMERSET:
My lord, most villanously; believe it.

PAULINA:
Not so:
I am as ignorant in that as you
In so entitling me, and no less honest
Than you are mad; which is enough, I'll warrant,
As this world goes, to pass for honest.

LEONTES:
Didst perceive it?
They're here with me already, whispering, rounding
'Sicilia is a so-forth:' 'tis far gone,
When I shall see this gentleman, thy speeches
Will bring me to consider that which may
Unfurnish me of reason. They are come.
Your mother was most true to wedlock, prince;
For she did print your royal father off,
Conceiving you: were I but twenty-one,
Your father's image is so hit in you,
His very air, that I should call you brother,
As I did him, and speak of something wildly
By us perform'd before. Most dearly welcome!
And your fair princess,--goddess!--O, alas!
I lost a couple, that 'twixt heaven and earth
Might thus have stood begetting wonder as
You, gracious couple, do: and then I lost--
All mine own folly--the society,
Amity too, of your brave father, whom,
Though bearing misery, I desire my life
Once more to look on him.

Son:
Was ever son so rued a father's death?

Second Citizen:
You shall ha' it, worthy sir.

CORIOLANUS:
I do demand,
If you submit you to the people's voices,
Allow their officers and are content
To suffer lawful censure for such faults
As shall be proved upon you?

Lords:
We can: my royal liege,
He is not guilty of her coming hither.

PETRUCHIO:
Then show it me.

GRUMIO:
First, know, my horse is tired; my master and
mistress fallen out.

CURTIS:
By this reckoning he is more shrew than she.

GRUMIO:
I would I were as sure of a good dinner.

TRANIO:
'Tis government that makes them seem divine;
The want thereof makes thee abominable:
Thou art a widow; yet thou art a mother,
And hast the comfort of thy children left thee:
But death hath snatch'd my husband from mine arms,
And pluck nights from me, but not lend a morrow;
Thou canst not frown, thou canst not look askance,
Nor bite the lip, as angry wenches will,
Nor hast thou pleasure to be cross in talk,
But thou with mildness entertain'st thy wooers,
With gentle conference, soft and affable.
Why does the world report that Kate doth limp?
O slanderous world! Kate like the hazel-twig
Is straight and slender and as brown in hue
As hazel nuts and sweeter than the kernels.
O, let me clip ye
In arms as sound as when I woo'd, in heart
As merry as when our nuptial day was done,
And tapers burn'd to bedward!

COMINIUS:
Nay, not as one would say, healthy; but so sound as
things that are hollow: thy bones are hollow;
impiety has made a feast of thee.

Tailor:

GRUMIO:
Why, she comes to borrow nothing of them.

NATHANIEL:
All things is ready. How near is our master?

GRUMIO:
O this woodcock, what an ass it is!

PETRUCHIO:
I swear I'll cuff you, if you strike again.

KATHARINA:
Why then, by God--

QUEEN MARGARET:

WARWICK:
What answers Clarence to his sovereign's will?

CLARENCE:
In God's name, cheerly on, courageous friends,
To reap the harvest of perpetual peace
By this one bloody trial of sharp war.

OXFORD:
Then Warwick disannuls great John of Gaunt, Henry the Fourth,
Whose heir my father was, and I am his.

YORK:
'Twas my inheritance, as the earldom was.

EXETER:
Hark, Petruchio; she says she'll see thee
hang'd first.

TRANIO:
Fear you not him. Sirrah Biondello, go and entreat my wife
To come to me forthwith.

PETRUCHIO:
Worse and worse; she will not come! O vile,
Intolerable, not to be endured!
Sirrah Grumio, go to your mistress;
Say, I command her to come to me.

GONZALO:
That our garments, being, as they were, drenched in
the sea, hold notwithstanding their freshness and
glosses, being rather new-dyed than stained with
salt water.

ANTONIO:
And most chirurgeonly.

GONZALO:
Beseech you, sir, look in this gentleman's face.
Good Master Froth, look upon his honour; 'tis for a
good purpose. Doth your honour mark his face?

ESCALUS:
Do you hear how he misplaces?

POMPEY:
If you head and hang all that offend that way but
for ten year together, you'll be glad to give out a
commission for more heads: if this law hold in
Vienna ten year, I'll rent the fairest house in it
after three-pence a bay: if you live to see this
come to pass, say Pompey told you so.

ESCALUS:
Well, well, we'll leave you.

SICINIUS:
Be calm, be calm.

CORIOLANUS:
How? what?

LARTIUS:
My noble masters, hear me speak.

FRIAR LAURENCE:
O, I am fortune's fool!

BENVOLIO:
Romeo will answer it.

MERCUTIO:
Nay, speak thy mind; and let him ne'er speak more
That speaks thy words again to do thee harm!

LORD WILLOUGHBY:
Base men by his endowments are made great.

DUKE OF AUMERLE:
Unto my mother's prayers I bend my knee.

DUKE OF YORK:

HENRY BOLINGBROKE:
I thank thee, good Sir John, with all my heart.
I am in your debt for your last exercise;
Come the next Sabbath, and I will content you.

BARNARDINE:

POMPEY:
To the ground, mistress.

MISTRESS OVERDONE:
What's to do here, Thomas tapster? let's withdraw.

POMPEY:
Yes, faith, sir.

PETRUCHIO:
'Tis very late, she'll not come down to-night:
But I am doubtful of your modesties;
Lest over-eyeing of his odd behavior,--
For yet his honour never heard a play--
You break into some merry passion
And so offend him; for I tell you, sirs,
If you should smile he grows impatient.

A Player:
I think 'twas Soto that your honour means.

Lord:
'Madam,' and nothing else: so lords
call ladies.

SLY:
I am, as thy general is.

First Keeper:
Ay, here's a deer whose skin's a keeper's fee:
This is the place; there, where the torch doth burn.

First Watchman:
'Tis but thy name that is my enemy;
Thou art thyself, though not a Montague.
What's Montague? it is nor hand, nor foot,
Nor arm, nor face, nor any other part
Belonging to a man. O, be some other name!
What's in a name? that which we call a rose
By any other name would smell as sweet;
So Romeo would, were he not Romeo call'd,
Retain that dear perfection which he owes
Without that title. Romeo, doff thy name,
And for that name which is no part of thee
Take all myself.

ROMEO:
Nurse, commend me to thy lady and mistress. I
protest unto thee--

Nurse:
Ay, ay, a scratch, a scratch; marry, 'tis enough.
Where is my wife?

Page:
My lord,
Fear none of this: I think you know my fortunes
Do all lie there: it shall be so my care
To have you royally appointed as if
The scene you play were mine. For instance, sir,
That, hearing of her beauty and her wit,
Her affability and bashful modesty,
Her wondrous qualities and mild behavior,
Am bold to show myself a forward guest
Within your house, to make mine eye the witness
Of that report which I so oft have heard.
And, for an entrance to my entertainment,
I do present you with a man of mine,
Cunning in music and the mathematics,
To instruct her fully in those sciences,
Whereof I know she is not ignorant:
Accept of him, or else you do me wrong:
His name is Barnardine.

DUKE VINCENTIO:
No might nor greatness in mortality
Can censure 'scape; back-wounding calumny
The whitest virtue strikes. What king so strong
Can tie the gall up in the slanderous tongue?
But who comes here?

DUCHESS OF YORK:
His nurse! why, she was dead ere thou wert born.

YORK:
Thanks, gentle Somerset; sweet Oxford, thanks.

PRINCE EDWARD:
God keep me from false friends! but they were none.

GLOUCESTER:

KING EDWARD IV:
Then speak at once what is it thou demand'st.

DUCHESS OF YORK:
Who hath committed them?

Messenger:
The news is very fair and good, my lord:
I never wish'd to see you sorry; now
I trust I shall. My women, come; you have leave.

LEONTES:
Shall I be your playfellow?

MAMILLIUS:
You have stood your limitation; and the tribunes
Endue you with the people's voice: remains
That, in the official marks invested, you
Anon do meet the senate.

CORIOLANUS:
Nay! prithee, woman,--

VOLUMNIA:
I pray you home to dinner with me.

NORTHUMBERLAND:
Believe me, this may be: he promised to meet me two
hours since, and he was ever precise in
promise-keeping.

Second Gentleman:
Who's that, I pray?

TRANIO:
Of all mad matches never was the like.

BRUTUS:
We pray the gods he may deserve your loves.

Second Citizen:
We may, sir, if we will.

Third Citizen:
You must think, if we give you any thing, we hope to
gain by you.

DUCHESS OF YORK:
Alas for both, both mine, Edward and Clarence!

QUEEN ELIZABETH:
Kind sister, thanks: we'll enter all together.
And, in good time, here the lieutenant comes.
Master lieutenant, pray you, by your leave,
How doth the prince, and my young son of York?

BRAKENBURY:
Why looks your grace so heavily today?

CLARENCE:
It shall be so, it shall be so.

CORIOLANUS:
Ha! what is that?

BRUTUS:
Let them go on;
This mutiny were better put in hazard,
Than stay, past doubt, for greater:
If, as his nature is, he fall in rage
With their refusal, both observe and answer
The vantage of his anger.

SICINIUS:
But how prevail'd you?

BIANCA:
Farewell!
I will omit no opportunity
That may convey my greetings, love, to thee.

CORIOLANUS:
Worthy man!

First Senator:
Behold our patroness, the life of Rome!
Call all your tribes together, praise the gods,
And make triumphant fires; strew flowers before them:
Unshout the noise that banish'd Marcius,
Repeal him with the welcome of his mother;
Cry 'Welcome, ladies, welcome!'

All:
Slain, sir, doubtless.

First Soldier:
'Twill grieve your grace my sons should call you father.

KING EDWARD IV:
What service wilt thou do me, if I give them?

LADY  CAPULET:
Hold, take my ring.

Servant:
Ye say honestly: rest you merry!

BENVOLIO:
Away, away, to meet the queen's great power!
3 KING HENRY VI

QUEEN ELIZABETH:
Flatter my sorrows with report of it;
Tell me what state, what dignity, what honour,
Canst thou demise to any child of mine?

TYRREL:
The chaplain of the Tower hath buried them;
But how or in what place I do not know.

KING EDWARD IV:
Belike she minds to play the Amazon.
But what said Lady Bona to my marriage?

Post:
He, more incensed against your majesty
Than all the complete armour that thou wear'st!
My prayers on the adverse party fight;
And there the little souls of Edward's children
Whisper the spirits of thine enemies
And promise them success and victory.
Bloody thou art, bloody will be thy end;
Shame serves thy life and doth thy death attend.

QUEEN ELIZABETH:
As little joy, my lord, as grieves me to unfold.

QUEEN MARGARET:
Bear with me; I am hungry for revenge,
And now I cloy me with beholding it.
Thy Edward he is dead, that stabb'd my Edward:
Thy other Edward dead, to quit my Edward;
Young York he is but boot, because both they
Match not the high perfection of my loss:
Thy Clarence he is dead that kill'd my Edward;
And the beholders of this tragic play,
The adulterate Hastings, Rivers, Vaughan, Grey:
But then I sigh; and, with a piece of scripture,
Tell them that God bids us do good for evil:
And thus I clothe my naked villany
With old odd ends stolen out of holy writ;
And seem a saint, when most I play the devil.
But, soft! what day is this?

QUEEN MARGARET:
My lord, I know him; 'tis a meddling friar;
I do not like the man: had he been lay, my lord
For certain words he spake against your grace
In your retirement, I had swinged him soundly.

First Musician:
Why 'Heart's ease?'

PETER:
Anon!

Nurse:
Your lady mother is coming to your chamber:
The day is hot, the Capulets abroad,
And, if we meet, we shall not scape a brawl;
For now, these hot days, is the mad blood stirring.

MERCUTIO:
Nay, it is ten times true; for truth is truth
To the end of reckoning.

DUKE OF AUMERLE:
My lord, there needs no such apology:
I rather do beseech you, which is the readiest way
To the house of Signior Baptista Minola?

BIONDELLO:
His daughter is to be brought by you to the supper.

LUCIO:
Is she your cousin?

JULIET:
It is not his, my lord; here Southam lies:
The drum your honour hears marcheth from Warwick.

WARWICK:
'Twas where you woo'd the gentlewoman so well:
I have forgot your name; but, sure, that part
Was aptly fitted and naturally perform'd.

A Player:
I think 'twill serve, if he
Can thereto frame his spirit.

VOLUMNIA:
I prithee, spare.

GONZALO:
I assure you, Carthage.

ADRIAN:
It must needs be of subtle, tender and delicate
temperance.

ANTONIO:
We are merely cheated of our lives by drunkards:
This wide-chapp'd rascal--would thou mightst lie drowning
The washing of ten tides!

GONZALO:
It is in mine authority to command
The keys of all the posterns: please your highness
To take the urgent hour. Come, sir, away.

HERMIONE:
Sir, spare your threats:
The bug which you would fright me with I seek.
To me can life be no commodity:
The crown and comfort of my life, your favour,
I do give lost; for I do feel it gone,
But know not how it went. My second joy
And first-fruits of my body, from his presence
I am barr'd, like one infectious. My third comfort
Starr'd most unluckily, is from my breast,
The innocent milk in its most innocent mouth,
Haled out to murder: myself on every post
Proclaimed a strumpet: with immodest hatred
The child-bed privilege denied, which 'longs
To women of all fashion; lastly, hurried
Here to this place, i' the open air, before
I have got strength of limit. Now, my liege, make them your precedent!
Were it not pity that this goodly boy
Should lose his birthright by his father's fault,
And long hereafter say unto his child,
'What my great-grandfather and his grandsire got
My careless father fondly gave away'?
Ah, what a shame! ah, what a fault were this!
Say Warwick was our anchor; what of that?

Nurse:
This afternoon, sir? well, I must wait,
And watch withal; for, but I be deceived,
Our fine musician groweth amorous.

HORTENSIO:
She will not come: she bids you come to her.

QUEEN ELIZABETH:
Hidest thou that forehead with a golden crown,
Where should be graven, if that right were right,
The slaughter of the prince that owed that crown,
And the dire death of my two sons and brothers?
Tell me, thou villain slave, where are my children?

DUKE OF AUMERLE:
Where is the provost?

DUKE OF YORK:
Peace, children, peace! the king doth love you well:
Incapable and shallow innocents,
You cannot guess wherefore the Welshman comes.
Thou wilt prove his. Take him to prison, officer:
Correction and instruction must both work
Ere this rude beast will profit.

ELBOW:
O thou caitiff! O thou varlet! O thou wicked
Hannibal! I respected with her before I was married
to her! If ever I was respected with her, or she
with me, let not your worship think me the poor
duke's officer. Prove this, thou wicked Hannibal, or
I'll have mine action of battery on thee.

ESCALUS:
Of whence are you?
Here's no place for you: pray, go to the door.

CORIOLANUS:
And live you yet?
O my sweet lady, pardon.

VOLUMNIA:
Anger's my meat; I sup upon myself,
And so shall starve with feeding. Come, let's go:
I am the greatest, able to do least,
Yet most suspected, as the time and place
Doth make against me of this direful murder;
And here I'll fling the pillow, there the bolster,
This way the coverlet, another way the sheets:
Ay, and make't manifest where she has lived,
Or how stolen from the dead.

PAULINA:
What studied torments, tyrant, hast for me?
What wheels? racks? fires? what flaying? boiling?
In leads or oils? what old or newer torture
Must I receive, whose every word deserves
To taste of thy most worst? Thy tyranny
Together working with thy jealousies,
Fancies too weak for boys, too green and idle
For girls of nine, O, think what they have done
And then run mad indeed, stark mad! for all
Thy by-gone fooleries were but spices of it.
That thou betray'dst Polixenes,'twas nothing;
That did but show thee, of a fool, inconstant
And damnable ingrateful: nor was't much,
Thou wouldst have poison'd good Camillo's honour,
To have him match'd; and if you please to like
No worse than I, upon some agreement
Me shall you find ready and willing
With one consent to have her so bestow'd;
For curious I cannot be with you,
Signior Baptista, for this fiend of hell,
And make her bear the penance of her tongue?

BAPTISTA:
But thus, I trust, you will not marry her.

LUCIO:
For that which, if myself might be his judge,
He should receive his punishment in thanks:
He hath got his friend with child.

ISABELLA:
I am directed by you.

DUKE VINCENTIO:
My very worthy cousin, fairly met!
Our old and faithful friend, we are glad to see you.

ANGELO:
Yet may he live awhile; and, it may be,
As long as you or I yet he must die.

ROMEO:
Neither, fair saint, if either thee dislike.

JULIET:
Now, by my holidame, here comes Katharina!

KATHARINA:
Young budding virgin, fair and fresh and sweet,
Whither away, or where is thy abode?
Happy the parents of so fair a child;
Happier the man, whom favourable stars
Allot thee for his lovely bed-fellow!

PETRUCHIO:
Nay, when? strike now, or else the iron cools.

WARWICK:
O, welcome, Oxford! for we want thy help.

MONTAGUE:
But the safer when 'tis back'd with France.

HASTINGS:
No news so bad abroad as this at home;
The King is sickly, weak and melancholy,
And his physicians fear him mightily.

GLOUCESTER:
Away betimes, before his forces join,
And take the great-grown traitor unawares:
Brave warriors, Clifford and Northumberland,
And of their feather many more proud birds,
Have wrought the easy-melting king like wax.
He swore consent to your succession,
His oath enrolled in the parliament;
And now to London all the crew are gone,
To frustrate both his oath and what beside
May make against the house of Lancaster.

WARWICK:
What answers Clarence to his sovereign's will?

CLARENCE:
It cannot be; for when I parted with him,
He hugg'd me in his arm, and kindly kiss'd my cheek;
Bade me rely on him as on my father,
And he would love me dearly as his child.

DUKE VINCENTIO:
The tongue of Isabel. She's come to know
If yet her brother's pardon be come hither:
But I will keep her ignorant of her good,
To make a bloody supper in the Tower.
But what's the matter, Clarence?  may I know?

CLARENCE:
In sign of truth, I kiss your highness' hand.

KING HENRY VI:
Full well hath Clifford play'd the orator,
Inferring arguments of mighty force.
But, Clifford, tell me, didst thou never see
thy master's father, Vincentio?

BIONDELLO:
Help, help, help! here's a madman will murder me.

Pedant:
Alas! sir, it is worse for me than so;
For I have more to commune with Bianca.

KATHARINA:
I pray you, tell me what you meant by that.

Widow:
He that is giddy thinks the world turns round.

PETRUCHIO:
Thy wit is a very bitter sweeting; it is a most
sharp sauce.

ROMEO:
Courage, man; the hurt cannot be much.

MERCUTIO:
God ye good den, fair gentlewoman.

Nurse:
See where she comes from shrift with merry look.

CAPULET:
Welcome, gentlemen! I have seen the day
That I have worn a visor and could tell
A whispering tale in a fair lady's ear,
Such as would please: 'tis gone, 'tis gone, 'tis gone:
You are welcome, sir.

FLORIZEL:
He shall not.

PETRUCHIO:
I tell thee, Kate, 'twas burnt and dried away;
And I expressly am forbid to touch it,
For it engenders choler, planteth anger;
And better 'twere you troubled him than France.

QUEEN ELIZABETH:
The loss of such a lord includes all harm.

GREY:
God keep the prince from all the pack of you,
That triumph thus upon my misery!
Go, get thee to thy love, as was decreed,
Ascend her chamber, hence and comfort her:
But look thou stay not till the watch be set,
For then thou canst not break her to the lute?

HORTENSIO:
Sir, induced by my charity, and hearing how hastily
you are to depart, I am come to advise you, comfort
you and pray with you.

ROMEO:
A gentleman, nurse, that loves to hear himself talk,
and will speak more in a minute than he will stand
to in a month.

Nurse:
A man, as you are.

Provost:
I do it not in evil disposition,
But from Lord Angelo by special charge.

CLAUDIO:
Why give you me this shame?
Think you I can a resolution fetch
From flowery tenderness? If I must die,
I will encounter darkness as a bride,
And hug it in mine arms.

ISABELLA:
Sir, believe this,
No ceremony that to great ones 'longs,
Not the king's crown, nor the deputed sword,
The marshal's truncheon, nor the judge's robe,
Become them with one half so good a grace
As mercy does.
If he had been as you and you as he,
You would have slipt like him; but he, like you,
Would not entreat for life?
My friend, I spy some pity in thy looks:
O, if a virgin,
And your affection not gone forth, I'll make you
The queen of Naples.

PROSPERO:
Follow me.
Speak not you for him; he's a traitor. Come;
I'll manacle thy neck and feet together:
Sea-water shalt thou drink; thy food shall be
The fresh-brook muscles, wither'd roots and husks
Wherein the acorn cradled. Follow.

FERDINAND:
Yes, faith, sir.

MENENIUS:
True! I'll be sworn they are true.

AUTOLYCUS:
A footman, sweet sir, a footman.

Clown:
Not swear it, now I am a gentleman? Let boors and
franklins say it, I'll swear it.

TRANIO:
Thou desirest me to stop in my tale against the hair.

BENVOLIO:
The date is out of such prolixity:
We'll have no Cupid hoodwink'd with a scarf,
Bearing a Tartar's painted bow of lath,
Scaring the ladies like a crow-keeper;
Nor no without-book prologue, faintly spoke
After the prompter, for our entrance:
But let them measure us by what they will;
We'll measure them a measure, and be gone.

ROMEO:
Can I go forward when my heart is here?
Turn back, dull earth, and find thy centre out.

BENVOLIO:
O noble prince, I can discover all
The unlucky manage of this fatal brawl:
There lies the man, slain by young Romeo,
That slew thy kinsman, brave Mercutio.

LUCENTIO:
I know you are now, sir, a gentleman born.

AUTOLYCUS:
Ha, ha, ha! So, you're paid.

ADRIAN:
Yet,--

ANTONIO:
Noble Sebastian,
Thou let'st thy fortune sleep--die, rather; wink'st
Whiles thou art waking and with brawling fed:
And that which spites me more than all these wants,
He does it under name of perfect love;
As who should say, if I should sleep or eat,
'Twere well for Kate and better for myself.
But what a fool am I to chat with you,
When I should bid good morrow to thy bed:
Care keeps his watch in every old man's eye,
And where care lodges, sleep will never lie;
But where unbruised youth with unstuff'd brain
Doth couch his limbs, there golden sleep doth reign:
Therefore thy earliness doth me assure
Thou art up-roused by some distemperature;
Or if not so, then here I hit it right,
Our Romeo hath not been in bed to-night.

BRUTUS:
Fame, at the which he aims,
In whom already he's well graced, can not
Better be held nor more attain'd than by
A place below the first: for what miscarries
Shall be the label to another deed,
Or my true heart with treacherous revolt
Turn to another, this shall slay them both:
Therefore, out of thy long-experienced time,
Give me some present counsel, or, behold,
'Twixt my extremes and me this bloody knife
Shall play the umpire, arbitrating that
Which the commission of thy years and art
Could to no issue of true honour bring.
Be not so long to speak; I long to die,
If what thou speak'st speak not of remedy.

FRIAR LAURENCE:
Not in a grave,
To lay one in, another out to have.

ROMEO:
The exchange of thy love's faithful vow for mine.

JULIET:
It is, my lord.

BUCKINGHAM:
My lord, we must entreat the time alone.

PARIS:
Beguiled, divorced, wronged, spited, slain!
Most detestable death, by thee beguil'd,
By cruel cruel thee quite overthrown!
O love! O life! not life, but love in death!

CAPULET:
Why, how now, long-tongued Warwick! dare you speak?
When you and I met at Saint Alban's last,
Your legs did better service than your hands.

WARWICK:
How now, my friend! why dost thou look so pale?

HORTENSIO:
How now! who calls?

Nurse:
Peter, stay at the gate.

JULIET:
The clock struck nine when I did send the nurse;
In half an hour she promised to return.
Perchance she cannot meet him: that's not so.
O, she is lame! love's heralds should be thoughts,
Which ten times faster glide than the sun's beams,
Driving back shadows over louring hills:
Therefore do nimble-pinion'd doves draw love,
And therefore hath the wind-swift Cupid wings.
Now is the sun upon the highmost hill
Of this day's journey, and from nine till twelve
Is three long hours, yet she is not come.
Had she affections and warm youthful blood,
She would be as swift in motion as a ball;
My words would bandy her to my sweet love,
And his to me:
But old folks, many feign as they were dead;
Unwieldy, slow, heavy and pale as lead.
O God, I have an ill-divining soul!
Methinks I am a prophet new inspired
And thus expiring do foretell of him:
His rash fierce blaze of riot cannot last,
For violent fires soon burn out themselves;
Small showers last long, but sudden storms are short;
He tires betimes that spurs too fast betimes;
With eager feeding food doth choke the feeder:
Light vanity, insatiate cormorant,
Consuming means, soon preys upon itself.
This royal throne of kings, this scepter'd isle,
This earth of majesty, this seat of Mars,
This other Eden, demi-paradise,
This fortress built by Nature for herself
Against infection and the hand of war,
This happy breed of men, this little world,
This precious stone set in the silver sea,
Which serves it in the office of a wall,
Or as a moat defensive to a house,
Against the envy of less happier lands,
This blessed plot, this earth, this realm, this England,
This nurse, this teeming womb of royal kings,
Fear'd by their breed and famous by their birth,
Renowned for their deeds as far from home,
For Christian service and true chivalry,
As is the spring to the earth. And hath he too
Exposed this paragon to the fearful usage,
At least ungentle, of the dreadful Neptune,
To greet a man not worth her pains, much less
The adventure of her person?

FLORIZEL:
Dear, look up:
Though Fortune, visible an enemy,
Should chase us with my father, power no jot
Hath she to change our loves. Beseech you, sir, be merry; you have cause,
So have we all, of joy; for our escape
Is much beyond our loss. Our hint of woe
Is common; every day some sailor's wife,
The masters of some merchant and the merchant
Have just our theme of woe; but for the miracle,
I mean our princely father, Duke of York.

WARWICK:
I think his understanding is bereft.
Speak, Clifford, dost thou know?

BLUNT:
He hath no friends but who are friends for fear.
Which in his greatest need will shrink from him.

CAMILLO:
I am appointed him to murder you.

POLIXENES:
I'll ha' thee burnt.

PAULINA:
True, too true, my lord:
If, one by one, you wedded all the world,
So soon as yours could win me: so it should now,
Were there necessity in your request, although
'Twere needful I denied it. My affairs
Do even drag me homeward: which to hinder
Were in your love a whip to me; my stay
To you a charge and trouble: to save both,
Farewell, good Pompey. Commend me to the prison,
Pompey.

ESCALUS:
Come, sir, your passado.

ROMEO:
Well, what then? what then?

MENENIUS:
Pray, good shepherd, what fair swain is this
Which dances with your daughter?

Shepherd:
Go to, go to: no matter for the dish, sir.

BAPTISTA:
I follow you.

BUCKINGHAM:
Marry, my child, early next Thursday morn,
The gallant, young and noble gentleman,
The County Paris hath set up his rest,
That you shall stifle in your own report
And smell of calumny. I have begun,
For sorrow ends not when it seemeth done.
Commend me to my wife. I'll return consul;
Or never trust to what my tongue can do
I' the way of flattery further.

VOLUMNIA:
He had, before this last expedition, twenty-five
wounds upon him.

First Murderer:
I would he had continued to his country
As he began, and not unknit himself
The noble knot he made.

BRUTUS:
If it were damnable, he being so wise,
Why would he for the momentary trick
Be perdurably fined? O Isabel!

ISABELLA:
My business is a word or two with Claudio.

First Gentleman:
Who would be thence that has the benefit of access?
every wink of an eye some new grace will be born:
our absence makes us unthrifty to our knowledge.
Let's along.

AUTOLYCUS:
I hope so, sir; for I have about me many parcels of charge.

Clown:
You are well met, sir. You denied to fight with me
this other day, because I was no gentleman born.
See you these clothes? say you see them not and
think me still no gentleman born: you were best say
these robes are not gentlemen born: give me the
lie, do, and try whether I am not now a gentleman born.

Clown:
Alas, my liege,
Ere further leisure yield them further means
For their advantage and your highness' loss.

KING RICHARD II:
He is our cousin, cousin; but 'tis doubt,
When time shall call him home from banishment,
Whether our kinsman come to see his friends.
Ourself and Bushy, Bagot and their complices,
The caterpillars of the commonwealth,
Which I have better'd rather than decreased:
Then tell me, if I get your daughter's love,
What dowry shall I have with her to wife?

BAPTISTA:
Talk not, Signior Gremio?

GREMIO:
A bridegroom say you? 'tis a groom indeed,
A grumbling groom, and that the girl shall find.

TRANIO:
Fear you not him. Sirrah Biondello, bid your mistress come to me.

Nurse:
Ay, a thousand times.
Peter!

PETER:
Then will I lay the serving-creature's dagger on
your pate. I will carry no crotchets: I'll re you,
I'll fa you; do you note me?

First Musician:
What a pestilent knave is this same!

Second Musician:
Hang him, Jack! Come, we'll in here; tarry for the
mourners, and stay dinner.

ROMEO:
Have not saints lips, and holy palmers too?

JULIET:
Madam, before you touch the meat.

KATHARINA:
Forward, I pray, since we have come so far,
And be it moon, or sun, or what you please:
An if you please to call it a rush-candle,
Henceforth I never will be Romeo.

JULIET:
Hist! Romeo, hist! O, for a falconer's voice,
To lure this tassel-gentle back again!
Bondage is hoarse, and may not speak aloud;
Else would I tear the cave where Echo lies,
And make her bear the penance of her tongue?

BAPTISTA:
Talk not, Signior Gremio has in Padua;
If wealthily, then happily in Padua.

TRANIO:
Call forth an officer.
Carry this mad knave to the gaol.

BAPTISTA:
Now, fair befall you! he deserved his death;
And you my good lords, both have well proceeded,
To warn false traitors from the like attempts.
I never look'd for better at his hands,
After he once fell in with Mistress Shore.

GLOUCESTER:
Your highness shall do well to grant her suit;
It were dishonour to deny it her.

KING EDWARD IV:
Now tell me, madam, do you love your children?

LADY CAPULET:
Marry, bachelor,
Her mother is the lady of the house,
And a good lady, and a wise and virtuous
I nursed her daughter, that you talk'd withal;
I tell you, friends, most charitable care
Have the patricians of you. For your wants,
Your suffering in this dearth, you may as well
Strike at the heaven with your staves as lift them
Against the Roman state, whose course will on
The way it takes, cracking ten thousand curbs
Of more strong link asunder than can ever
Appear in your impediment. For the dearth,
The gods, not the patricians, make it, and
Your knees to them, not arms, must help. Alack,
You are transported by calamity
Thither where more attends you, and you slander
The helms o' the state,
If he should still malignantly remain
Fast foe to the plebeii, your voices might
Be curses to yourselves? You should have said
That as his worthy deeds did claim no less
Than those she placeth highest! So, farewell.

SICINIUS:
'Tis false.

ESCALUS:
If any in Vienna be of worth
To undergo such ample grace and honour,
It is Lord Angelo.

DUKE OF YORK:
Thy life hath that dishonour'd.

KING HENRY VI:
Far be the thought of this from Henry's heart,
To make a dulcet and a heavenly sound;
And if he chance to speak, be ready straight
And with a low submissive reverence
Say 'What is it your honour will command?'
Let one attend him with a silver basin
Full of rose-water and bestrew'd with flowers,
Another bear the ewer, the third a diaper,
And say 'Alas, it was a piteous deed!'
There, take the crown, and, with the crown, my curse;
And in thy need such comfort come to thee
As now I reap at thy too cruel hand!
Hard-hearted Clifford, take me from the world:
My soul to heaven, my blood upon your heads!

NORTHUMBERLAND:
My lord, will't please you to fall to?

KING RICHARD II:
It boots thee not to be compassionate:
After our sentence plaining comes too late.

LUCENTIO:
Tranio is changed into Lucentio.

LADY GREY:
Ay, full as dearly as I love myself.

ANGELO:
I will not reason what is meant hereby,
Because I will be guiltless of the meaning.
Here are the keys, there sits the duke asleep:
I'll to the friar, to know his remedy:
If all else fail, myself have power to die.

EXTON:
Didst thou not kill this king?

GLOUCESTER:
A wise stout captain, and soon persuaded!

HASTINGS:
To Lynn, my lord,
Would you not deem it breathed? and that those veins
Did verily bear blood?

POLIXENES:
You weary those that refresh us: pray, let's see
these four threes of herdsmen.

Servant:
My lord, I know him; 'tis a meddling friar;
I do not like this news.

SICINIUS:
Nay, he will answer the letter's master, how he
dares, being dared.

MERCUTIO:
Right.

ROMEO:
Is the day so young?

BENVOLIO:
It was. What sadness lengthens Romeo's hours?

ROMEO:
Wilt thou, O God, fly from such gentle lambs,
And throw them in the entrails of my lambs.
But that still use of grief makes wild grief tame,
My tongue should to thy ears not name my boys
Till that my nails were anchor'd in thine eyes;
Examine other beauties.

ROMEO:
What wilt thou tell her, nurse? thou dost not mark me.

Nurse:
Yes, madam: yet I cannot choose but laugh,
To think it should leave crying and say 'Ay.'
And yet, I warrant, it had upon its brow
A bump as big as a young cockerel's stone;
A parlous knock; and it cried bitterly:
'Yea,' quoth my husband,'fall'st upon thy face?
Thou wilt be taken. Stay awhile! Stand up;
Run to my study. By and by! God's will,
What simpleness is this! I come, I come for Lancaster.
And, noble uncle, I beseech you, mark it well.

ESCALUS:
My lord, I know a discontented gentleman,
Whose humble means match not his haughty mind:
Gold were as good as twenty orators,
And will, no doubt, shortly be rid of me.

QUEEN:
What sport shall we devise here in this garden,
To drive away the heavy thought of care?

Lady:
Madam, what makes you in this sudden change?

QUEEN MARGARET:
O princely Buckingham I'll kiss thy hand,
In sign of league and amity with thee:
Now fair befal thee and thy noble house!
Thy garments are not spotted with our blood,
Nor thou within the compass of my curse.

BUCKINGHAM:
Good Catesby, go, effect this business soundly.

DUKE VINCENTIO:

Provost:
Pray you, let's hear.

Provost:
Call hither Barnardine and Claudio:
The one has my pity; not a jot the other,
Being a murderer, though he were my brother.
Look, here's the warrant, Claudio, for thy death:
'Tis well; and hold your own, in any case,
With such austerity as 'longeth to a lover's blessed case!
Nay, then, 'tis time to stir him from his trance.
I pray, awake, sir: if you love the maid,
Bend thoughts and wits to achieve her. Thus it stands:
Her eldest sister is so curst and shrewd
As Socrates' Xanthippe, or a worse,
She moves me not, or not removes, at least,
Affection's edge in me, were she as rough
As are the swelling Adriatic seas:
I come to bring him sleep. 'Tis such as you,
A sea and land full. You have pray'd well to-day:
This morning for ten thousand of your throats
I'd not have given a doit. Hark, how they joy!

SICINIUS:
What do you think?

QUEEN MARGARET:
Why, so he doth, now he delivers thee
From this world's thraldom to the joys of heaven.

First Murderer:
'Zounds, he dies: I had forgot the reward.

First Murderer:
Who made thee, then, a bloody minister,
When gallant-springing brave Plantagenet,
Which held three dearly as his soul's redemption,
Is by the stern Lord Clifford done to death.

CATESBY:
My lord?

KING RICHARD II:
Uncle, even in the glasses of thine eyes
I see thy grieved heart: thy sad aspect
Hath from the number of his banish'd years
Pluck'd four away.
Six frozen winter spent,
Return with welcome home from banishment.

ROMEO:
A thousand times good night!

POLIXENES:
O, then, I see, you will part but with light gifts;
In weightier things you'll say a beggar nay.

GLOUCESTER:
He is; and, see, he brings the mayor along.

BUCKINGHAM:
My lord!

KING RICHARD III:
So, I am satisfied. Give me a bowl of wine. Give me a watch.
Saddle white Surrey for the field to-morrow.
I am question'd by my fears, of what may chance
Or breed upon our absence; that may blow
No sneaping winds at home, to make us say
'This is put forth too truly:' besides, I have stay'd
To tire your royalty.

LEONTES:
Tongue-tied ambition, not replying, yielded
To bear the golden yoke of sovereignty,
Which fondly you would here impose on me;
If to reprove you for this suit of yours,
So season'd with your faithful love to me.
Then, on the other side, I cheque'd my friends.
Therefore, to arms! And, father, do but think
How sweet a thing it is to wear a crown;
Within whose circuit is Elysium
And all that poets feign of bliss and joy.
Why do we finger thus? I cannot rest
Until the white rose that I wear be dyed
Even in the lukewarm blood of Henry's heart.

YORK:
Open Thy gate of mercy, gracious God!
My soul flies through these wounds to seek out Thee.

QUEEN:
O, I am slain!
If thou be merciful,
Open the tomb, lay me with Juliet.

ROMEO:
Why, then, I will. Farewell, old Gaunt: thy sometimes brother's wife
With her companion grief must end her life.

JOHN OF GAUNT:
O, to what purpose dost thou hoard thy words,
That thou return'st no greeting to thy friends?

HENRY BOLINGBROKE:
Our scene is alter'd from a serious thing,
And now changed to 'The Beggar and the King.'
My dangerous cousin, let your mother in:
I know she is an irksome brawling scold:
If that be all, masters, I hear no harm.

GREMIO:
O sir, the loathsomeness of them offends me more
than the stripes I have received, which are mighty
ones and millions.

Clown:
How do you both? you are manifest house-keepers.
What are you sewing here? A fine spot, in good
faith. How does your little son?

VIRGILIA:
O heavens! O wife, look how our daughter bleeds!
This dagger hath mista'en--for, lo, his house
Is empty on the back of Montague,--
And it mis-sheathed in my daughter's bosom!

LADY CAPULET:
A jealous hood, a jealous hood!
Now, fellow,
What's there?

Servant:
These were his very words.

EXTON:
As full of valour as of royal blood:
Both have I spill'd; O would the deed were good!
For now the devil, that told me I did well,
Says that this deed is chronicled in hell.
This dead king to the living king I'll bear
